GK16ruyalscu:0: śrīmadvidyācakravartiviracitā sañjīvanyākhyā vyākhyā viśvaṃ prakāśayati yā jātiguṇādyātmakaiḥ nijaiḥ prasaraiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:8: kiṃ vistareṇa bahunā ṭīkāṃ sañjīvanīmimāṃ kaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:10: tatra tāvadadhikṛteṣṭadevatānamaskāra puraskāreṇa prakaraṇapratipādyamarthaṃ pratijānīte namaskṛtya paramiti /
GK16ruyalscu:11: sarvaiva khalviyaṃ vāk parā paśyantī madhyamā vaikharīti caturbhiḥ padaiḥ parimīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:27: tṛtīyā nābhyantarī na ca bāhyeti kṛtvā madhyamā /
GK16ruyalscu:29: yadvā “khaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca; tadviśiṣya rāti dadātīti vikharo dehendriyasaṅghātaḥ tatra bhavā vaikharīti” jñeyam /
GK16ruyalscu:32: kīdṛśīṃ devīm? parādibhiścaturbhiḥ padaiḥ krīḍantīṃ nāmapūrvakatvāt sarvasyaiva rūpasya jagadetadvijigīṣamāṇāṃ samastavyavahārātmikāṃ svarūpāvabodhakṣamatayā dyutimayīmanyastutaustotavyatāyāṃ ca
GK16ruyalscu:35: namaskāro hi nāma pṛthagahaṅkāraparityāgena namaskartavyamahimodghāṭanaṃ sāmarasyamiti yāvat
GK16ruyalscu:41: itthamimāṃ vācaṃ namaskṛtya nijānāṃ svenaiva praṇītānām alaṅkārasūtrāṇāṃ tātparyamucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:43: kena prakāreṇa? vṛttyā vṛtti svarūpeṇa sandarbheṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:44: atha dhvanidarśanānusāreṇa prakāraṇaṃ praṇinīṣuḥ bhāmahodbhaṭādīnāṃ darśanasthitiṃ pūrvapakṣatveno panyasyati-iha hi tāvadbhāmahodbhaṭetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:48: yathā- bhama dhaṃmia vīsattho so suṇāo ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:49: golāṇai kaccha kuḍaṅga vāsiṇā daria sīheṇa //
GK16ruyalscu:51: sthitaḥ, sākṣātsaṅketitatvenā vyavadhāna pratītikatvāt; godāvarītīre siṃhopalabdhyā bhramaṇaniṣedhastu
GK16ruyalscu:53: itthaṃ vācyavilakṣiṇaḥ pratīyamāno yor'thaḥ sa yathāyogaṃ rasavastvalaṅkārasvarūpeṇa triskandhaḥ san sacamatkāratvāt kavisaṃrambha gocaratvāt sahṛdayapratīti viśrāntiviṣayatvāñca kāvyātmā tasya mādhuryādayo guṇāḥ śauryādivatsamavāyavṛttyā upakurvate /
GK16ruyalscu:58: alaṅkārapakṣa nikṣiptaṃ manyante, tattvaṃ punaranyatheti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:60: paryāyoktamaprastutapraśaṃsā samāsokti rākṣepaḥ vyājastutirupameyopamā ananvayaḥ ityādiṣu vastumātrameva pratīyate na tu rasālaṅkārau /
GK16ruyalscu:67: atra hayagrīvasya svargavijayaḥ sainikasāvaghajñapārijātamañjarī sparśalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa pratyāyyate
GK16ruyalscu:71: yathā- taṇṇātthiṃ kiṃpi pahaṇo pakappiyaṃ jaṃ ṇa ṇiai gharaṇīe /
GK16ruyalscu:76: atra anavaratagamanaśīlasya patyurnijagṛhiṇyā pātheyatvena yanna kalpitaṃ tadyathā nāsti, tathā kālapathikasya pāthematvena yadakalpitaṃ tannāstītyatra kālaḥsava grasatīti sāmānyarūpādaprastutāt prastuto
GK16ruyalscu:80: yathā- upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham /
GK16ruyalscu:81: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣyitam //
GK16ruyalscu:83: uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā prākāraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyartham ābhāsato niṣedhanamākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:84: yadvakṣyati uktavakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayorviśeṣapratītyarthaṃ niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepaḥ iti /
GK16ruyalscu:85: yathā - bālagra!ṇāhaṃ dūri tīe piosit ti ṇāmhavāvāro /
GK16ruyalscu:86: sā marai tujbhpha ayaso eaṃ dhaṃmakkharaṃ bhaṇimo //
GK16ruyalscu:89: iti cchrāyā '] atra 'nāhaṃ dītiti' dītitvaniṣedho viśiṣṭāsmi dūtītyavagamayati /
GK16ruyalscu:92: yathā - he helājitabodhisattva vacasāṃ kiṃ vistaraistoyadhe! nāsti tvatsadṛśaḥ paraḥ parahitādhāne gṛhītavrataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:97: yathā-'khamiva jalaṃ jalamiva khaṃ haṃsaśvandra iva haṃsa iva candraḥ' /
GK16ruyalscu:104: eṣu paryāyoktāduṣu yadetadvastumātraṃ pratīyate svargavijayādikaṃ rasālaṅkāraparihāreṇa tadidaṃ sarvairapi pramāṇairātmatvenā vabhāsamānameva sadgaja nimīlikayā vācyāpaskārakatvena tairudbhaṭādibhiḥ pratipāditam /
GK16ruyalscu:106: kena prakāreṇa pratipāditam? “svasiddhaye parākṣepaḥ parārthaṃ svasamarpaṇam” iti dvividhayā bhaṅgyā /
GK16ruyalscu:112: tatrājahastvārthāyāṃ kuntānāṃ svataḥ praveśāsaṃbhave kauntikān ākṣipya praveśasaṃbhavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:118: itthaṃ ca satispṛṣṭāstā nandana' iti paryāyoktodāharaṇe sainikānāṃ
GK16ruyalscu:119: sāvajñapārijātamañjarīsparśaḥ svargavijayamanākṣipya na saṃbhavatīti kuntādinayena svasiddhaye parākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:132: tathā hi- yasya vikāraḥ prabhavannapratibandhena hetunā yena /
GK16ruyalscu:133: gamayati tadabhiprāyaṃ tatprati bandhaṃ ca bhāvo 'sau // iti //
GK16ruyalscu:137: yato bhāvāsaṅkārasya sandhiśabalatādi lakṣaṇā api bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:138: vakṣyati hi - bhāvodaya sandhiśabalatāśca pṛthagalaṅkārā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:144: upamālaṅkārasya vācyaśobhā hetutvādupanyagbhāvanena utthāpitasya prādhanyena teṣvavasthānāt
GK16ruyalscu:146: raso guṇībhūto rasavānalaṅkāro, bhāvastu preyān, rasābhāsa ūrjasvī,
GK16ruyalscu:158: itthaṃ kāvyajīvitāṃśavicāravimukhānām alaṅkāramātrarasikatvāt uttānadṛśāṃ matam upanyasya, kāvyajīvitakāṃśaparāṇāṃ, matāni
GK16ruyalscu:163: sādṛśyanibandhanā lakṣaṇā vakroktyalaṅkāra “iti prathayatā kaścit dhvanibhedo lakṣaṇāmūlo 'tyantatiraskṛtavācya nāmālaṅkāratvenoktaḥ kāvyātmabhūtaḥsannalaṅkāryatvena nāvadhārita itiyāvat yasttvaṃśo 'laṅkāryo na bhavati so 'pyalaṅkāryatvena kathita
GK16ruyalscu:166: rasālaṅkāra nirapekṣairmādhuryādi bhirguṇairviśiṣṭā yeyaṃ saṃghaṭanādharmabhūtā vaidarbhyādi rūpiṇī rītiḥ saiva kāvyātmetyuktā /
GK16ruyalscu:167: tathā ca sūtritaṃ tena - “rītiḥ ātmā kāvyasya”iti /
GK16ruyalscu:168: prakhyāpitaṃ ca - aviditaguṇāpi satkavibhaṇitiḥ karṇoṣu vamati madhudhārām /
GK16ruyalscu:169: anadhigataparimalāpi hi harati dṛśaṃ mālatīmālā / iti //
GK16ruyalscu:173: vyaṅgyārthastu ātmabhūta iti sthite, śabdālaṅkārebhyoṣa'pi yo bāhyo varṇālaṅkāro 'nuprāsastatsamakakṣyakā etā rītayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:175: etadabhisandhāya vṛttyanuprāsavarṇālaṅkāraprastāve vaidarbhyādayo rītayo vivecitāḥ kāvyaprakāśa kṛdādibhiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:191: tathāhi-aṅgino rasasya dharmā guṇāḥ aṅgayoḥ śabdārthayostvalaṅkārāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:199: itthaṃ ca sati alaṅkārāpekṣayā guṇeṣveva prakṛṣṭaḥ kāvyopaskāraḥ yadvadasphuṭaṭālaṅkāratve 'pi kāvyatvābhyupagamaḥ, na hi tadvat
GK16ruyalscu:202: yadetadevaṃvidhaṃ guṇānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ ca prādhānyaṃ , tatrāpi purātanānāṃ dṛṣṭirasamīcīnetyāha-'tadevaṃ alaṅkārā eveti' /
GK16ruyalscu:207: anyo 'pi sārabhūtaḥ sūkṣmoṃ'śaḥ tena avadhārita ityabhiprāyeṇāha-vyāpāraprādhānyaṃ ceti
GK16ruyalscu:212: yaśca vastvalaṅkārarasarūpaḥ trividhaḥ pratīyamānor'thaḥ yatra vidyamāno 'pi tatpratyāyanalakṣaṇasya' vyāpārasyaiva prādhānyamasya matamityāha-satyapi cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:213: upacāro lakṣaṇāśrayaṇāṃ tadvakrateti avivakṣitavācyādi samastadhvaniḥ kaṭākṣitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:214: itthaṃ ca sati dhvanidarśanā detad darśanasyālpakobheda
GK16ruyalscu:219: idṛśasya vyañjanavyāpārasya kāvyātmatvaṃ kathayatā nyagbhāvitaśabdārtha svarūpo 'yaṃ vyāpārastasyaiva prādhānyamuktam /
GK16ruyalscu:220: sa ca vyāpāro laukiko na bhavatītyāha-tatrāpyabhidhābhāvaka tvetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:224: etadvyāpāradvaradvayot tīrṇaḥ sādhāraṇīkṛteṣu vibhāvādiṣu rasacarvaṇātmāṃ bhogāparanāmadheyo vyāpāro viśrāntisthānatayā prādhanyenāṅgīkṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:234: dhvananaṃ dyotanaṃ pratyāyanaṃ vyañjanamityādiprasiddhaparyāyasahatastrasyāvaśyābhyupagamyatvāt tadanabhyupagame vyaṅgyārthapratītau na gatyantaraṃ yataḥ, ataḥ
GK16ruyalscu:236: nanu vyañjanāvyāpāraḥ pradhānaṃ kiṃ na bhavati, ityata āha-vyāpārasya ca vākyārthatvābhāvāditi
GK16ruyalscu:238: sarvā eva khalu padārthaśaktayaḥ kāryādipratītyanyathānupapattyā abhyūhyanta eva /
GK16ruyalscu:240: yaśca hetuḥ prādhānye so 'pi vyaṅgya evopapadyate, na tu vyañjanavyāpāra
GK16ruyalscu:247: yathāsvarūpopalambho viṣayamukhena tathā prādhānyaṃ vicārakṣamatvamapi tanmukhenaivetyāha-tatprādhānyena prādhānyāt /
GK16ruyalscu:249: viṣaya eva tu puṣkalaṃ vākyārthaṃ bhāvamarhatītyāha-viṣayasyaiveti /
GK16ruyalscu:250: sākṣātsvarūpa pratilaṃbhaḥ svataḥ prādhānyaṃ svalarūpeṇa vicāryatvaṃ cetyādi samagre bharaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:255: nanu rasādayo rasavadādyālaṅkārā eva prācāṃ matāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:259: rasādīnāṃ hi yadā guṇībhāvaḥ tadālaṅkāratvaṃ , yadā tu prādhānyaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:261: yata itthaṃ vyavasthā , atoḥ vyaṅgyārtha eva kāvyātmeti nigamayati -
GK16ruyalscu:263: vākyārthībhūta iti prādhānyadaśāṃ kaṭākṣayati, aprādhānaya daśāyāmanātmatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:269: ya icchranti vyaṅgyārthasya kāvyātmatāṃ, ye ca necchanti , sarvaireva khalvebhiḥ na śakyate hi vyañjanavyāpāro 'pahnotum /
GK16ruyalscu:270: yadi nāpahnutaḥ kiṃ tata ityata āha-tadāśrayaṇe cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:272: yattu tatra vyaktivivekakāraḥ pratyavasthaitaḥ tadupanyasyati - yattu vyaktivivekakāraḥ ityādinā
GK16ruyalscu:277: anayorniyatasambandhayoḥ yadyanyataro na syāt tadā vyabhicārānna saṃbhavati liṅgaliṅgibhāva iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:278: yata itthametat atastadavicāritābhidhānaṃ , tadetadvyaktivivekakṛto darśanaṃ vāyasavāśitakalpamiti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:287: yadyasti kiṃ tata ityata āha-tatra vyaṅgyasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:291: sa cābhidhāmūlatayā lakṣaṇāmūlatayā ca prathate ityāha-tasya
GK16ruyalscu:293: lakṣaṇāmūlatve sati avivakṣita vācyākhyaḥ mukhyārthabādhaśālinyāṃ lakṣaṇāyāṃ vācyāṃśasyāvivakṣitatvāt
GK16ruyalscu:294: abhidhāmūlatve tu vivakṣitānyaparavācyākhyaḥ , abhidhāyāṃ vācye bādhābhāvād vivakṣitatvaṃ, vyaṅgyāṅgatvena vivakṣaṇāt anyaparatā ceti vivakṣitānyaparatvam abhidhāmūlasya /
GK16ruyalscu:299: yathā - prārambhe śrutisundaraṃ pariṇātau pathyaṃ janaiḥsugrahaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:301: āhlādāya na kasya nāma viduṣāṃ vaktrāmbujādudgataṃ cittāntarvikasadviveka mukulāmodānubiddhaṃ vacaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:304: atha yadā jahatsvārthatayā parārthaṃ svasamarpaṇaṃ tadātyantatiraskṛtavācyākhyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:305: yathā - eke mūkavadāsate jaḍadhiyo jihneti tatsannidhā vanye
GK16ruyalscu:307: asthāne bahudhā stuvanti katicittairulkayā dahyate vidyā viklavate kayā na vidhayā prāpyāntikaṃ duṣprabhoḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:308: atra vidyāyāṃ hlībībhatsādiḥ gaṅgādau ghoṣādhikaraṇatādīva sarvathā svasaṃyogino svārthaṃ parityajya na saṃbhavatītyatyanta tiraskṛtavācyatā /
GK16ruyalscu:314: tatra kvicid vyaṅgya kramo na saṃlakṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:319: yo hi lakṣaṇāmūlaḥ sa niyameva śabdaśaktimūlo vasturūpaśca bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:320: yadvi yāvadasti jātiguṇākriyādyātmākaṃ padārthajātaṃ sarvamevaitadvastu kathyate /
GK16ruyalscu:323: atha vivakṣitānyaparavācyo yo 'yaṃ asaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ sa niyamenārthaśaktimūla ubhayaśaktimūlaśca bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:325: tatra yadā rasabhāvarasābhāsa bhāvābhāsabhāvodayabhāvaśānti bhāvasandhibhāvaśabalatā vyajyante, tadā kramo na saṃlakṣyata iti asaṃlakṣyakramatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:326: tatra raseṣu śṛṅgāraḥsaṃbhogātmā yathā- puṣpodbhedamavāpya keliśayanāddarasthayā cumbane kāntena sphuritādhareṇa nibhṛtaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:328: ācchādya smitapūrṇā gaṇḍaphalakaṃ celāñcalenānanaṃ mandāndolitakuṇḍalastabakayā tanvyā vidhūtaṃ śiraḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:329: atra nāyikānāyakavṛttāntalakṣaṇo yo vācyor'thaḥ yā ca sahṛdayapratīteḥ
GK16ruyalscu:330: vedyāntaravigalanena varṇyavastutanmayībhāvalakṣaṇā rasasaṃvit, na khalu tayoḥ kramaḥsaṃlakṣyate
GK16ruyalscu:332: vipralambhaśṛṅgāro yathā - nāntaḥ praveśamaruṇādvimukhī na cāsī dācaṣṭaroṣa paruṣāṇi na cākṣarāṇi
GK16ruyalscu:333: sā kevalaṃ saralapakṣmabhirakṣipātaiḥ kāntaṃ vilokitavatī jananirviśeṣam
GK16ruyalscu:335: hāsyo yathā - paimaraṇāmaṇḍaṇājjalavesā pāsaṃga esu taruṇesu /
GK16ruyalscu:336: ṇiddhasaraṃ parugrantī savibbhamaṃ haṇā i thaṇāvaṭṭham //
GK16ruyalscu:337: atra patimaraṇāmaṇḍanojjvalaveṣāyāḥ taruṇeṣu pārśvamupagateṣu satsu sadyaḥ snigdhasvaraṃprarudatyāḥ savibhramaṃ yadetatstanavṛttahananaṃ tat pracchannānurāgasyānaucityena pravṛtterhāsyamabhivyanakti karuṇasya yathā - sāhityalakṣaṇakale samupaiṣi navya vaidhavyamadya virate guruviṣṇudeve
GK16ruyalscu:339: raudranya yathā - dṛpyatsūkara kālakaṇṭha śakalavyākīrṇa dhārāntarā krodhottālalulāyakaṇṭhanalakacchedārdhavaktrānanāḥ
GK16ruyalscu:340: śrīballāla vidhāya keli mṛgayāmāvartamānasya te śārdūlendravasābhiṣekasamaye jīyāsurugrāḥśarāḥ
GK16ruyalscu:341: vīrasya yathā - ādhāturbhuvanaṃ tadetadakhilaṃ cakṣuṣmadākīṭakā-d divyaṃ cakṣurananyalabhya mubhayatrāste paraṃ duḥsaham /
GK16ruyalscu:342: phāle bhūtapatermanobhavamukha kṣudra kṣayojjāgaraṃ bāṇe ca pratirājadarpadalanaṃ ballāla pṛthvīpateḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:343: bhayānakasya yathā - girikuñjeṣu gūḍhānāṃ tavāri varayoṣitām /
GK16ruyalscu:345: bībhatsasya yathā - svātmānandaṃ kimapi paramaṃ sādhu saṃbhuñjate ye
GK16ruyalscu:347: anyeṣāṃ tu prasaratitarāṃ pratyutāsvādanecchā chardiklinne kaphakaluṣite makṣikāṇāmivānne
GK16ruyalscu:348: adbhutasya yathā - ākarṇitottamaguṇānuguṇeti kṛtvā yāmullilekha sucireṇa mano madīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:349: tāmākṛtiṃ visadṛśīmatimātramasyā dāsye 'pi nāsmi viniveśayituṃ vidagdhaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:350: atra sucira madṛṣṭacaranāyikārūpasyānuguṇa śravaṇānurāgiṇo nāyakasya nāyikāprathamadarśane ākarṇitottama guṇānuguṇatayā manasā samullikhitacarī yā nāyikāmūrtiḥ, sā samprati sāśrātkṛtanāyikāmūrteratimātraṃ visadṛśī satī dāsītvenāpi niveśayituṃ na śakyata ityuktirābhirūpyanibandhanasya parāṃ
GK16ruyalscu:352: śāntasya yathā - mā bhaiṣīḥ kula mā vyathasva vinaya kleśo 'stu mā te śruta pradhvaṃsāya yatasva mā khalu mate māhātmya mā mā tyaja /
GK16ruyalscu:353: yuṣmadrauravasāradāraṇāparānmatvā tṛṇāya prabhūn bhikṣāparyaṭanārjitena kalaye piṇḍena piṇḍasthitim
GK16ruyalscu:355: atha bhāvadhvaniḥ-bhāvo hi nāma nāyikāvyatirikte devatāgurunṛpaputrādau vyajyamānā ratirvākyārthatvena vyajyamānā nirvedādayo vyabhicāriṇāśca /
GK16ruyalscu:356: yathā- adya svapnamupāgatena yamunātīre mayāvasthitaṃ dṛṣṭastatra ca
GK16ruyalscu:358: taṃ dṛṣṭvā karaṇairananyaviṣayairantarvilīno 'bhavaṃ yāvattāvadahaṃ cirādupacitaiḥ pāpaiḥ prabodhaṃ gataḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:359: yathā ca - saṃsārārtyā vidhuravidhuro brahma yatnādvicinvan nānārūpaṃ jagadidamahaṃ dṛṣṭavāneva pūrvam /
GK16ruyalscu:360: haste nyaste sati tava guro sāṃprataṃ mastake 'smim
GK16ruyalscu:362: yathā ca - kāṣṭhāprātpiriyaṃ parā khalu parīpākasya bhāgyonnateḥ śrī
GK16ruyalscu:364: yastiṣṭhetpratihāra sīmni bhavato ruddhapraveśaściraṃ kiṃ nāsāvapi colapāṇḍyapṛthvīpālaiḥsamaṃ gaṇyate //
GK16ruyalscu:377: bhāvodayo yathā - kelitalpagatamaṅghriyāvakaṃ, sūcayatyuṣasi cakṣuṣā priye
GK16ruyalscu:378: bhū[bhrū] tribhāgamupakalpya bhaṅguraṃ, gūḍha hāsa madhuraṃ cukopa sā //
GK16ruyalscu:380: bhāvasandhiryathā - netre jihyakharāruṇe kṣaṇāmatha vyāmīlyamānekṣaṇāṃ hastaṃ vyagragamāganaṃ kṣaṇāmatho dante śayānaṃ kṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:381: sañcāraṃ viṣamākulaṃ kṣaṇamatha prakrāntalīlaṃ kṣaṇaṃ dhatte totriṣu ṣaṭpadeṣu ca samaṃ dattāvadhāno gajaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:382: atra gajasya madākulasya yadetatkṣaṇamātraṃ netrayoḥ jihyākharā ruṇāyoḥ dharaṇāṃ samanantarameva yaccaitadūvyāmīlanaṃ, tathā haste ca
GK16ruyalscu:383: yatkṣaṇāmatraṃ vyagro gamāgamaḥ yacca samanantarameva dante śayanaṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:384: sañcāre ca kṣāṇāmātraṃ yeyaṃ viṣamākulatā, samantarameva yaścāyaṃ līlāprakramaḥ, tadetat vividhaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viceṣṭitadvayaṃ udbhavābhibhavadharmitayā kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇāmāvirbhavat totriviṣayaṃ roṣaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:385: ṣaṭpadaśabdalakṣitaṣaṭpadagītaviṣayaṃ harṣa ca parasparasyādattā vasaratayāsamutkṣubhitam abhivyanakti /
GK16ruyalscu:386: dvandva vṛttiṣu ca triṣvapi vākyeṣu pratisvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamityupādānādyathā yathā samutkṣubhitābdhikallolakatpa
GK16ruyalscu:387: totriṇāmuparyupari vinipāta janmāno roṣāveśamahāvegāḥ tathā tathā tadabhibhavakṣamāṇāṃ ṣaṭpadagītākarṇānasukhābhiniveśavikāsānāṃ madhye prādurbhāva iti pratyāyyante /
GK16ruyalscu:388: dhatta iti vartamānanirdeśena prārabdhāparisamātpabhāvādekatarasyāṃ koṭāvaniṣṭheti dyotyate
GK16ruyalscu:391: totriṣuṣaṭpadeṣu ca tulitamavadhānadānaṃ tadapyeka tarasyāṃ koṭā vaniṣṭāmeva vyanakti /
GK16ruyalscu:395: sāsūyasapraṇāyasatrapa saprasādaiḥ sā māṃ vilokitavatī caṭulaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ
GK16ruyalscu:398: bhāvaśāntiryathā tau saṃmukhapracalitau savidhe guruṇāṃ mārgapradānarabhasaskhalitāvadhānau
GK16ruyalscu:403: atha saṃlakṣyakrame śabdaśaktimūlo 'laṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśca niyamena bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:406: tasyāḥ kaṭākṣavalanaṃ gurusannidhau māmāśrliṣyatīva samavāpya ca bāhubhāvam //
GK16ruyalscu:407: atrotprekṣālaṅkāreṇa cumbanādikāraṇā bhāve 'pi saṃbhogasukhā vātpilakṣaṇākāryotpattirūpā vibhāvanā vyajyate /
GK16ruyalscu:410: saṃsparśaṃ ca na tasya vetyupacitastambhaṃ mamaitadvapuḥ saṃvṛttaḥsakhi saṅgamo 'pi virahaprāyo vidhātāsmi kim //
GK16ruyalscu:411: atra vastuni avastutvabhramāt maugdhyalakṣaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:414: sa cālaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti pratyekaṃ dvaividhye ṣoḍhā /
GK16ruyalscu:416: tathā hi - svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā alaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:417: svataḥsaṃbhavinālaṅkāroṇa vastu, tena alaṅkāra iti caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:418: tathā kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena vastunā vastu, tenālaṅkāraḥ kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena alaṅkāreṇa vastu tena alaṅkāraḥ ityapi caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:421: atra prapañcaḥ saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭokāyāṃ asmābhiḥ vitatyopa darśita iti tato 'vadhāryaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:422: iha tu granthagauravabhayāt prastāvānupayogācca na pratanyate /
GK16ruyalscu:423: diṅmātrantūdāhliyate- tatra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā vastu yathā - adyāpi loke na kavirna so 'sti prācāṃ tulāṃ yaḥ prabalo 'dhiroḍhum /
GK16ruyalscu:424: purātano nāyamitīya deva tathāpi nindā yadi kiṃ karotu //
GK16ruyalscu:425: atra svataḥsaṃbhavinā vastunā aham evaṃvidha iti vaktuḥ svamāhātmyaprakhyāpanalakṣaghaṇaṃ vastu pratyāyyate //
GK16ruyalscu:426: kavinibaddhenālaṅkāreṇa vastu yathā - dṛṣṭirniṣṭhura baddhasārakhadirāṅgāra sphuliṅgopamā jihve sajjanatarjanolbaṇābalatkālāṅgulīcañcale /
GK16ruyalscu:429: atra kaviprauḍhoktiniṣpāditena aprastutapraśaṃsālaṅkāreṇa vidhivihitamanāryāṇāṃ kvicidaṃśe daurbalyaṃ viśvamabhirakṣatīti vastu /
GK16ruyalscu:436: kavinibaddhāyāḥ svairiṇyāḥ prauḍhoktiniṣpāditena rūpakālaṅkāreṇa upagūhanādinivāraṇāśālibhyo 'sya bāndhavamaraṇamahotsavasya atiśayapratyāyanātmā vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ pratyāyyate /
GK16ruyalscu:440: vācyāṅgatvamagūḍhatvamaparāṅgatvamasphuṭatvam, sandigdhaprādhānyaṃ tulyaprādhānyaṃ kākkākṣitpa masundaratvam iti vācyāṅgatvādayo bhedāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:443: tatra vācyāṅgatvaṃ yathā - śūnye tvadripurājadhāmni sudṛśāṃ citrārpitā nāṃ karaṃ saṃllāpaspṛhayā patannapi muhuḥ kīraḥsamārohati /
GK16ruyalscu:444: śrīballālanṛpāla! śiñjitarasānmañjīrarekhāmukhaṃ cañcvagreṇa ca hanta haṃsapṛthukaḥsañcālayankrandati
GK16ruyalscu:448: itthaṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ kāvyayoḥsvarūpamupodgadhātatvena yathāyogamupanyasya prakaraṇā pratipipādayiṣitaṃ citrākhyaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:452: ihārthapaunaruktyaṃ śabdapaunaruktyaṃ śabdārthapaunaruktyaṃ ceti trayaḥ paunaruktyaprakārāḥ nanu citramityupakramya paunaruktyaprakārakathane kā saṅgatiḥ ityata āha ādau paunakuktyetyādi
GK16ruyalscu:453: paunaruktyaprakārāṇām eṣāṃ yadetadādau vacanantinnirūpayiṣyamāṇānāṃ śabdārthobhayāśrayatayā kakṣyāvibhāgaṃ ghaṭayituṃ kakṣyāvibhāgasyaiva ca sphuṭīkārāya pratyekaṃ paunaruktyagrahaṇam ato 'nuprāsayamakādayaḥ śabdālaṅkārāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:456: nanu śabdapratītipūrvakatvādarthapratīteḥ prathamaṃ arthapaunaruktyanirdeśo na yujyata ityata āha-arthāpekṣayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:464: nanu traya evetisamāptyarthatā kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-triśabdādevetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:467: triśabdāttu parisamātpiḥsiddhā, 'siddhe satyārambho niyamāya' iti nyāyāt /
GK16ruyalscu:469: na ca mantavyaṃ sati prakāraśabde paunaruktyaṃ prasajediti /
GK16ruyalscu:470: prakāraśabdo hi paunaruktyaprakāramābaha-sa ca paunaruktyaprakāraḥ kena
GK16ruyalscu:471: prakāreṇa triprakāra iti jijñāsāyām itiśabdaḥ tatprakāra vacana iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:473: triprakāratva vacanaḥ iti śabdastato mataḥ // iti //
GK16ruyalscu:479: upādeye pratiyegyantare prasṛtāyāḥ pratipattṝ pratīteḥ avyākṣepāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:482: bhāvānayane dravyānayanamiha anusartavyaṃ nirdhārite paunaruktyatraya ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:485: yacchravaṇasamanantaraṃ yathāvadavabhātaṃ tattathaiva cetpratītiḥviśrāntyantaṃ nirbādham avatiṣṭheta sa praroha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:490: nanu lakṣyapade punaruktavadābhāsa iti svarūpaprādhānyena nirdeśo nyāyyaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:491: na tu punaruktavadābhāsamiti kāvyaparatantratayā ityata āha-lakṣyanirdeśa
GK16ruyalscu:493: nāpuṃsakaḥ saṃskāraḥ punaruktavadābhāso yatreti bahubrīhisamāsāśrayaṇenālaṅkāryapāratantryadhvananārthaḥ iti laukikālaṅkāravanna kāvyālaṅkārāṇāṃ alaṅkāryapṛthagbhāvenāpyavasthānasaṃbhavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:500: valayaṃ kaṅkaṇāñceti āmukhe paunaruktyā vabhāsanaṃ, paryavasāneṣu ahīnasya mahato bhujaṅgādhīśasya vapurvalayaṃ kaṅkaṇamasyetyanyathātvam /
GK16ruyalscu:501: itthaṃ śilāderapatyaṃ śailādiḥ śailādeḥ nandina iva caritamasyeti,
GK16ruyalscu:503: tayā kṣataḥ kandarpo darpaśceti, kṣataḥ kandarpadarpo yeneti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:504: tathā vṛṣaḥ puṃrūpo gauśceti, vṛṣaḥśreṣṭha iti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:505: tathā śikhī pāvakaśca locane yasyeti ca śikhipāvakalocana iti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:506: tathā sarvamaṅgalāsahitaḥ pārvatīśa iti ca sarvairmaṅgalaismahitaśteti paunaruktyaṃ cāmukhābhāsanaṃ, paryavasānānyathātvaṃ ca anusandheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:507: atha vyastatayā samāsāntarāyaśrayatayā ca darśiyitumudāharaṇāntaraṃ-dāruṇa iti /
GK16ruyalscu:511: itthaṃ bhasma ca bhūtiśceti bhasmavano 'bhivṛddiriti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:512: tathā raktaṃ ca śoṇāṃ ceti ca rudhiravacchreṇamiti cāvagantavyamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:515: kuṇḍalī sarpo bhujaṅgaśca kuṇḍalī ceti bhujaṅgakuṇḍalavāniti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:517: śaṃ śivaḥ śubhraiḥ aṃśubhiḥ śītaṃ cakṣurindriyamiti ca /
GK16ruyalscu:518: haraḥśiva iti ceto hara iti ca yojanīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:520: pāyādavyācceti tu tiṅantāpekṣayā ita ityapāyaviśeṣaṇatvena paryavasāne pañcamyantatayā pāyādavyādityanyathātvam
GK16ruyalscu:525: atrādyaṃ padamuddeśyaṃ caramaṃ tu dvayaṃ vidheyam /
GK16ruyalscu:529: alaṅkāro hi vicchrittiḥ, tatprastāve kevalasvarapaunaruktyama cārutvāt na gaṇanāmarhatīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:540: nanu sāyaṃ kāyamityatra ko 'laṅkāra ityata āha-atra sāyaṃ śabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:543: itthaṃ ca sati sāyaṃ śabde dvayorekābhidhānalakṣaṇāḥsaṅkaraḥ abhidhatta ityabhidhānaṃ vācaka śabdaḥ ekavācakānupraveśalakṣaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:553: śṛṅgārādirasaviṣayo yo 'yaṃ pratiniyamabhājāṃ varṇānāṃ vyañjanavyāpāraḥ sa vṛttirucyate /
GK16ruyalscu:563: yāvatā śabdālaṅkāreṣvapi yo bahiraṅgo vṛttyanuprāsātmā varṇālaṅkāraḥ taddharmatvāt tacchreṣabhūtā etā ityalamaprāsaṅgikavaidaddhya pravacanena /
GK16ruyalscu:569: sitāsitaruceḥ uttaralatārakatvāt anavasthitavarṇasanniveśāḥ sācīkṛtāḥ apāṅgānnirgantum ivehamānāḥsālasā rasānuśayaṃ nivartamānāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:571: sākūtā bhavatu paśyāma itīva vyāharantyaḥ sarasāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:572: raso rāge viṣe vīrye tiktādau pārade drave /
GK16ruyalscu:573: roṣāruṇimnā viṣayaṃ viṃliṃpantyaḥ mānānuvidvāḥ dṛṣṭaśrutādyaparādhajanmā roṣomānastena saṃmūrcchitāḥ jvalatkalpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:577: yadyapi kavervāṇī prabalena śabdāḍambareṇa khelantī prārambhe prathate,
GK16ruyalscu:578: tathāpi satāṃ mānorañjanaṃ na kurute amandaiḥ sundaraiśca guṇālaṅkāraiḥ mukharīkṛtaḥ saniṣpandaṃ vilasadrasāyana rasā sārānusārī śṛṅgārādiko raso yāvanna syādityatra kevalavarṇā sāmyañcaturṣvapi pādeṣvalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:579: bhphaṅkāritetyādāvekadhā samudāyasādṛśyaṃ rasāyana rasetyatra tu raseti samudāyatrayasya parasparasādṛśyamityanusandheyam
GK16ruyalscu:580: tathā ca “āṭope” tyādau gauḍīyā “amandasundare” tyādau vaidarbhī,
GK16ruyalscu:583: so 'nuprāsaḥsa ca cheka vṛttyu pādhiva śādrūdvidhā //
GK16ruyalscu:594: svaravyañjanātmakasya śabdasamudāyasya yattenaiva rūpeṇa punarvacanaṃ tadyamanādyamakam /
GK16ruyalscu:602: rucire ramye vanajāyate padmadalavat dīrghe tasyāḥ netre yo yaḥ paśyayati,
GK16ruyalscu:604: idaṃ dvayoḥsārthakatve anarthakatve dvairūpye yathā- tvaṃ rāvaṇa!
GK16ruyalscu:609: itthamarthapaunaruktye punaruktavadābhāsaṃ śabdapaunaruktye tu anuprāsayamakālaṅkārau ca vivecitau
GK16ruyalscu:616: śabdasyārthasya ca punarvacanamanuvādādatirikte viṣaye doṣaḥ ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:619: yatra paunaruktye śabdārthau tāveva, tātparyamātraṃ tvanyat /
GK16ruyalscu:623: tadā jāyante guṇāḥ yadā te sahṛdayairgṛhyante /
GK16ruyalscu:625: atra dvitīyayorguṇa kamalaśabdayoḥ ślāghādyā śrayatvaṃ tātparyabhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:626: nanu yatra prakṛtimatraṃ tadarthaśca punarucyate, na pratyayatadarthau,
GK16ruyalscu:634: itthaṃ ca sati padanubandhanatayā prātipadika mātranibandhanatayā ca lāṭānuprāso dvidhā mantavyaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:637: tatra yadyapi arthapaunaruktyaṃ lakṣaṇam, athāpi śabdapaunaruktyaṃ doṣabhayādaṅgīkriyata eva /
GK16ruyalscu:645: yatra tāveva śabdārthau tātparyaṃ tu vibhidyate /
GK16ruyalscu:652: tathopamādayo 'pi sādharmyādivyapāśrayeṇa vargaśo 'vasthāyina ityava bodhitaṃ mantavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:658: sthānaviśeṣeṣu khaṅgādyavayavaviśeṣeṣu vinyāsakrameṇaśliṣṭānāṃ varṇānāṃ yatpāṭhe paunaruktyaṃ tadātmakasya khaṅgabandhādicitrasya kathanaṃ paunaruktyaprastāve saṅgacchrata ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:659: nanu kathamayaṃ śabdālaṅkāraḥ? lipisanniviṣṭānāṃvarṇānāṃ vācakatvābhāvāt ityata āha-yadyapītyadi
GK16ruyalscu:660: khaṅgādisanniveśo hi lipyakṣarāṇām eva na śrotrākāśa samavāyināmṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:661: vācakatvaṃ tu śrotrākāśasamavāyināmeva na punarlipi sanniveśinām /
GK16ruyalscu:662: itthaṃ ca sati khaṅgādibandhagatānāṃ yadyapi vācakaśabdālaṅkāratā
GK16ruyalscu:665: ataḥ sthūlabuddhilālanīyatvāt vācakaśabdabahirbhāvācca nātra kavibhirādaraḥ kārya iti mantavyam
GK16ruyalscu:668: ato yathāvyutpatti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ ca padmamuraja gomūtrikādibandhānāṃ parigraho 'bhyanujñāyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:675: śubhā vāde tattvabubhutsā(sayā?) tu (vā?) vijigīṣayā vā vādamātre vidagdhā
GK16ruyalscu:678: dalāni dikṣu catvāri catvāri ca vigikṣu, prathamākṣaraṃ karṇikāyām /
GK16ruyalscu:679: atha daleṣu dvayaṃ dvayamakṣarāṇāṃ prāgdalāt prādakṣiṇyena pāṭhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:681: atrāyaṃ niṣkarṣaḥ- karṇikāyāṃ likhedekaṃ dvau dikṣu vivikṣu ca /
GK16ruyalscu:688: || arthārthālaṅkārāḥ || tatra sādṛśyavicchrattiviśeṣaiḥ nānālaṅkārabījabhūtāmupamāmādau lakṣayituṃ sūtram /
GK16ruyalscu:690: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nayatītyupamānam aprākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamena adhikaguṇameva bhavati guṇādhāvṛtvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:691: upamīyate sādharmyaṃ nīyate ityupameyaṃ prākaraṇikor'thaḥ tacca niyamenādheyaguṇatvāt nyūnaguṇāmevaṃ bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:692: tayoryastulita bhadābhedāṃśaḥ samānadharmābhisambandhaḥ , sa upamālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:699: ato merusarṣapādau vivakṣayā parikalpayituṃ śakyo 'pi upamānopameyabhāvo nālaṅkāraviṣayaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:701: bhedābhedetyasya vyāvartya darśayituṃ sādharmyaṃ prakārānvivinakti sādharmye yatra ityādi
GK16ruyalscu:707: bhegābhedatulyatva evopamā syāditi yaduktaṃ tatprāmāṇikasaṃvādena draḍhayitumāha-yadāhurityādi
GK16ruyalscu:711: sadṛśatāyāḥ upamāyā; sādharmyavaidharmyayoḥ tulayā vṛttāvupamā syāditi yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:712: yadetadasyā uddeśe prāthamyaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ darśayati-upamaiva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:722: candra eva na mukham iti apahnutaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:725: asyāṃ prāvṛṣi mukhaṃ candrabimbañca vicchrāyamityekā tulyayogitā /
GK16ruyalscu:728: mukhameva ramyaṃ candra eva hṛdya iti prativastūpamā /
GK16ruyalscu:733: na mukhena vinā candraḥ samīcīnā itivinīktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:737: mukhe roṣo na doṣāya nahīndo rnindāyai kalaṅkarekhetyarthāntanyāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:747: ayaṃ punarācāryaḥ sarvasyaivopamāprapañcasya anyaiḥ anupapāditacara vaicitryatrayamupapādayiṣurāha-tatrāpi sādhāraṇādharmasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:749: mukhaṃ candra iva hṛdyamityekenaiva rūpeṇa hṛdya tvādeḥsādhāraṇadharmasya nirdeśaḥ kriyate ityekaṃ vaicitryam /
GK16ruyalscu:751: ekor'tho vastutvenopameyagataḥ prativastutvena nirdiśyata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:754: “valitakandharamānanamāvṛttavṛntaśatapatranibham” ityādau hi yena saha saṃbadhnāti sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ sa sambandhī, kevalaṃ bhinnaḥ ekatra
GK16ruyalscu:760: abhinna dharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:762: abhinnadharmasya bhedena nirdeśe nyāyoyaḥsa ihāpi saṃbhavatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:763: yadā punaraṃsārpita hāro 'yaṃ sanirjharodgāra ivetyādau sādharmyaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:770: yā yāvatī saṃbhavatyupamāpūrṇā lutpā ca saprabhedaprapañcā sā sarvaivāsmadupadarśitena vaicitryatrayeṇa tridhā prathata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:772: prabhāpekṣayā mahatīti kathanāt svāpekṣayā tanvīti vivakṣyate /
GK16ruyalscu:774: ubhe hi khalu ete svāpekṣayā tanīyasyau prabhāpekṣayā tu mahatyau /
GK16ruyalscu:776: tatra vācisaṃskāro vyākṛtiḥ, devyāṃ tu nisargasiddhadivyānubhāvavāsanānuvṛttiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:780: itthaṃ ca satyanupāttasyāpi sādhāraṇadharmasyānu gāmitayaikarūpyeṇa nirdeśa udāhṛto mantavyaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:781: yadvā trimārgayetyetadeva tantreṇa nyāyena devīviśeṣaṇatayāpi saṅgacchrate
GK16ruyalscu:791: yāntyā upavanātpuraṃ prati kareṇukayā gacchantyāsahacarīsaṃllāpādivyapadeśena vāraṃvāramapavṛttaśirodharā, ata eva āvṛttavṛntasya kalahaṃsakarṇakaṇḍūyanādinā vivalitabandhanasya kuśeśayasya sadṛśyam ānanam vahantyāḥ kaṭākṣo me hṛdaye nikhātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:792: apāṅge nikṣitpā cakṣuḥprabhā sa kaṭākṣaḥ, saḥ kīlita iva /
GK16ruyalscu:793: kena prakāreṇa? gāḍhaṃ paricālyāpi utkīlayituṃ na śakyate, yathā tatheti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:794: kīṭṭakkaṭākṣaḥ? amṛtena digdhaḥ litpaḥ, yatastadā jīvāturabhūt /
GK16ruyalscu:796: atraika eva dharmaḥsambandhibhedena valitāvṛttaśabdābhyāṃ vastuprativastubhāvena nirdiṣṭaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:806: nanu upameyatvamupamānatvaṃ ca kathamekatraiva saṅgacchta ityāha-vācyābhiprāyeṇotyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:807: pūrvaṃ rūpamupameyatvaṃ tadanugamo vācyābhiprāyeṇa yatpunarapūrvaṃ rūpamupamānatvaṃ tadanugamo vyaṅgyābhiprāyeṇeti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:808: nanvekatra viruddhadharmopanibandhalabhyaḥ kor'tha ityata āha-ekasya tu viruddhetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:817: atra prathamārjunabhīmaśabdau vācyaparau, caramau tu vyaṅgyaparau /
GK16ruyalscu:830: itthaṃ ca satyupamānopameyabhāvavyatyayo vākyaikavākyatāmantareṇa na saṃbhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:854: iyaṃ yoddhukāmaṃ lavamālokya sakautukasya sūtasya candraketuṃ pratyuktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:858: atra hi pūrvānubhūtārthadarśanādeva smṛtiḥ na tu sadṛśānubhavāt /
GK16ruyalscu:863: kintu mṛgayānivṛttyādikaṃ smartavyasutpiviśeṣaṇamata iṣṭārtho 'pi na bhavatītyabhavanmatayogākhyo 'yaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:864: nanu yadi preyo 'laṅkāro ratibhāvātmakaḥ, na tadā smṛtiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:869: atrābhiniviṣṭasya nāyakasya priyānurāgasaṃskārāṇāṃ saskārāntarābhibhāva katayābhūyobhūyaḥsamuddhudhyamānānāṃ mahimnaiva smṛtiḥ, nahi sadṛśānubhāvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:871: vibhāvānubhāvādibhiḥ yadā smṛtirvyajyate, tadaiva hi bhāvālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:877: nanvaśakyavastvantarakaraṇaṃ viśeṣālaṅkārasya lakṣaṇaṃ, iha tu karaṇaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:879: kṛñbhvastyarthānāṃ sarvadhātvanuyāyitvāt kriyāyāḥsāmānyātmā karotyarthaḥ darśane 'pi saṃbhavata
GK16ruyalscu:888: nanu smararipudarśanakautukāstamaye prakṛtanāyakadarśanaṃ heturiti kāvyaliṅgaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-matāntara ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:889: asmaddarśane viśeṣālaṅkāraḥ, matāntare kāvyaliṅgaṃ, smaraṇaṃ tu sarvatra
GK16ruyalscu:899: candratvādyāropasya yo viṣayo mukhādiḥ tasyānapahnavaśca rūpakālaṅkāra iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:902: athāropa śabdārthaṃ vivṛṇvan vyudasanīyaviṣayavivecanapuraskāreṇa viṣayamasya vivecayati-āropo 'nyatrānyeti /
GK16ruyalscu:904: sa ca dviṣṭhatvāt viṣayiṇā viṣayeṇa cāvaṣṭabhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:906: yadā candra eva na mukhamiti viṣayasyāpahnavaḥ tadāpahnutyalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:909: viṣayī viṣayaṃ svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ karotīti rūpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:918: yata itthamabhedenādhyavasāyaḥ prakṛṣyate, atastanmūlālaṅkārāṇāṃ vibhajanaṃ paścātkariṣyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:923: tatra yadyapi pratyāsannopakāriṇāṃ prādhānyaṃ, tathāpi teṣāṃ sūkṣmataratvāt sthūlālaṅkārapuraskāreṇa vyutpādanamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:931: samastāni niravaśeṣāṇi viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyātmakāni vastūni viṣayo yasya tat samastavastuviṣayam
GK16ruyalscu:932: yatpunaḥ viśeṣaṇāṃśe kvacinna kriyate viśeṣaṇāṃśāntare viśeṣye ca kriyate tadekadeśa eva viśiṣya vartanādekadeśavivarti /
GK16ruyalscu:934: śliṣṭaśabdam aśliṣṭaśabdaṃ ceti dvairūpyamanuprapadya pratisvaṃ kevalaṃ mālārūpaṃ ceti pratama ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:940: yadā tu viśeṣaṇāṃśa rūpaṇabalādeva viśeṣye rūpakamarthādavagamyate, tadā samāsoktirūpakam
GK16ruyalscu:942: evamādibhedāḥ sthūlatayā na pratanyanta iti āha-anyetvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:953: atra grāmyajanoktau samastapadārthaviṣayatvāt samastavastuviṣayaṃ sāvayavaṃ rūpakam /
GK16ruyalscu:957: atra kīrtīnāṃ haṭhahṛtamahilātvamarthāt pratīyata iti ekadeśa vivarti sāvayavam /
GK16ruyalscu:958: kṣitibhṛta ityaṃśe tu saṃkaraḥ ityabhiprāyeṇāha-kṣitibhṛta ityatretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:960: atra na hanti kimityādau nāñā prathamato hananādināṣedhaḥ kimiti kākvā nirākriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:962: atra vaktrenduriti rūpaṇam yasyenduniṣṭhasya pīyūṣasya hetuḥ tadadharāmṛtena saha śliṣṭam
GK16ruyalscu:964: ata indurūpaṇadvārā bhātatvāt paraṃparitaṃ kevalaṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:967: viduṣāṃ mānasameva mānasaṃ tatra haṃsaḥ , vairiṇāṃ kamalāyāḥ lakṣmyāḥ
GK16ruyalscu:971: tadabhāva eva durgāyāḥ kātyāyinyā mārgaṇaṃ tatra nīlalohitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:972: samitaḥ saṃgrāmāḥ tā eva samidha edhāṃsi tatsvīkāre vaiśvānaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:976: dakṣaḥ dakṣaprajāpatiḥ vijaye prāgbhāvo 'gresaratā sa eva vijayādarjunātprāgbhāvaḥ purojanma tatra bhīma!vatsaraśatamityantasaṃyoge
GK16ruyalscu:979: atra viduṣāṃ mānasetvaṃ haṃsa iti pratītau kathamasya haṃsatvamiti vimarśo
GK16ruyalscu:981: tathāvagamitena śleṣeṇa haṃsatvameva vyavatiṣṭhata iti śliṣṭaśabda paraṃparitamṣa /
GK16ruyalscu:986: dakṣabhīmapadayoḥ śleṣa eva pratītiviśrāntaḥ aṃśāntaramihodāharaṇamiti sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:1004: na kevalamidaṃ paraṃparitaṃ rūpakam anvayamukhenaiva yāvatā vyatirekamukhenāpi saṃbhavatītyāha-idaṃ cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1011: tatra kā gatirityata āha - atra cāropyamāṇasyetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1012: satyam, āviṣṭaliṅgasaṅkhyākatvaṃ dharmiṇo yuktaṃ, tatra liṅgānyathā karaṇo
GK16ruyalscu:1024: tairetaiḥ nimittairaṣṭabhiḥ viṣakāryaireva garalarūpor'thaṃ udbhāvyata iti neha viṣaśabdaśleṣo rūpakahetukaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1027: evaṃvidhe viṣaye śleṣa eva na tu rūpakamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1049: tasmādāropyamāṇaṃ candratvādimukhādau prakṛtārthe tādrūpyapratītyādhānarūpeṇa uparañjakatvenaiva rūpakālaṅkāre 'nvayaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:1052: pariṇāmālaṅkāre punaḥ āropyamāṇaṃ na kevalaṃ prakṛtoparañjakaṃ yāvatā prakṛtarūpamapahnuvānaṃ sattadātmatvenopayujyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1062: itthaṃ ca sati viṣayitvāropaṇaṃ viṣaye tādrūpyapratītimātraṃ
GK16ruyalscu:1063: cedvivakṣyate, tadā tādrūpyapratīti janakatva mātramu parañjakatvam itye
GK16ruyalscu:1065: atastādrūpyapratītimātra prasiddhyarthaṃ prakṛtam (a)prakṛta rūpāpānnaṃ bhavati rūpake /
GK16ruyalscu:1068: itarathā rūpakanyāyena prakṛtasya svarūpasthaganena prakṛtameva na pratīyeta /
GK16ruyalscu:1069: kā tatra prakṛtopayogitā? tadabhāve ca kā rūpakasya viviktaviṣayatā?
GK16ruyalscu:1084: na khalvayaṃ kāvye lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ āgamarūpeṇa vā anumānarūpeṇa vā khyā
GK16ruyalscu:1086: tatrāpi sāṅkhyayogādiśāstraviṣayeṇa pratijñātaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ śrīguruprasādasamanantaraṃ śaiśava eva yathā - “śaivaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:1089: bhūtānāṃ tu vinodanāya bharataṃ nīrti ca vātsyāyanaṃ /
GK16ruyalscu:1090: ṣaḍbhāṣākavitāṃ ca lakṣaṇavatīṃ śrīcakravartī kaviḥ “ // iti //
GK16ruyalscu:1092: spardhayā sisādhayiṣu (ṣūn)dustārkikajaradgavān pratyāpahālaparasya mamāyamanyaḥ ślokaḥ- sāṅkhyaṃ veśmani veśmani śrutiśiraḥ kakṣyāsu kakṣyāsu
GK16ruyalscu:1093: ca dvāri dvāri śivāgamāḥ pathi pathi prācāṃ kavīnāṃ giraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1096: mahārāja vīraballālāsthānajuṣāṃ viduṣāṃ prasādāśiṣo hi mayyetāḥ prathante
GK16ruyalscu:1097: kāstāḥ? saṃskṛtasārvabhaumaḥ , prākṛta pṛthvīśvaraḥ śaurasenī śiromaṇi magidhīmakaradhvajaḥ ṣaiśācīparameśvaro 'pabhraṃśarājahaṃso
GK16ruyalscu:1103: veśaṣyābhujaṅga ityādyā mahārājahosalarāja kuladvāri praśasti śilāśāsanaprabhṛtibhiḥ vayamupaśāntarabhasāḥ
GK16ruyalscu:1104: atra tu granthe kāvyamīmāṃ(sā)nikaṣatāṃ mamopayāntu vatsalāḥsacetasaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1106: sā cāyaṃ pariṇāmālaṅkāro dvirūpa iti vyutpādayati-tasya
GK16ruyalscu:1115: atrātarasyā prakṛtasyā na kevalaṃ maitrītādrūpyapratītimātraṃ vivakṣyate,
GK16ruyalscu:1117: ataḥ aprakṛtasya prakṛtarūpāpannasya prakṛtopayoga iti prakṛtasya svarūpādapracyuteḥ pariṇāmatvam
GK16ruyalscu:1122: yata itthaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaprayoge pariṇāmālaṅkārasya viṣayavyavasthātasmāt samāsoktisādharmyamastīti
GK16ruyalscu:1125: upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā nasāmukham /
GK16ruyalscu:1126: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam //
GK16ruyalscu:1128: na lakṣita[mi]ti vākyānupreśāntaṃ vivakṣita iti prakṛtopayogī /
GK16ruyalscu:1132: na tu rūpakanyāyena rūpasamāropamātramityaṃśe pariṇāmasamāsoktyoḥ sādharmyamavagantavyamityata āha-evamihāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:1135: nanu yadi dvayoḥ prayogastarhi pariṇāmatvameva kathamityata
GK16ruyalscu:1137: na khalu tādātmye sati “kṣīraṃ dadhīti” prayogamātrāt pariṇāmatvahāniḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1154: nanu viṣayatve nirjñāte 'kaḥsandeha ityāha-viṣaya(ḥ) prakṛta ityādi' /
GK16ruyalscu:1155: nirjñātameva ṇukhādilakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtamarthaṃ bhittī kṛtya candrādāvaprakṛter'thesandihyamāne sandehasya dviṣṭhatvāt prakṛtor'tho 'pi
GK16ruyalscu:1157: itthaṃ prakṛtāprakṛtagatatvena ya utthāpyate pratibhayaiva sandehaḥ, sa sandeho 'laṅkāraḥ na tu sthāṇupuruṣādāviva svarasavāhī /
GK16ruyalscu:1167: sarvā diśo na prasaratīti ūrdhva jvalanaikasvabhāva rūpatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:1169: atrāsaṅkhya turagatvā dinā mārtaṇḍatvadisandehāpagama eva jāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:1170: tena punarnāyakasya śṛṅgrāhikayā rūpanirjñānamiti niścayābhāsā ete /
GK16ruyalscu:1174: parato niścitamiti kathanāt dvitīyārdhānte itthaṃ sandihyetyadhyāhāryam /
GK16ruyalscu:1175: kvacitpunarviṣaye saṃśayitavye 'pira āropyamāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ viṣayāntaratvamapi bhavatīti āha-kvacidityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1180: nanvatra sambhāvanāpi pratīyata iti kathaṃ sandehālaṅkāra ityata
GK16ruyalscu:1199: niṣpatya ālīya sādṛśyāditi yaduktaṃ tatra pratyudājihīrṣurāha-gāḍhamarmetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1228: tāmanatikramya rucyādiṣu triṣu yathāyogamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayameva vā prayojakaṃ bhavatītiyāvat
GK16ruyalscu:1237: janapade hi tapovanatvādi dharmā nisargata eva santi /
GK16ruyalscu:1241: samastā vyastā iti munyādīnāṃ tapovanā ditvenollekhe tathāvidhā rucyādayo hi samastatayā vyastatayā vā saṃbhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:1245: yatra tvaṃśe rūpakaṃ tatra yadyullekhātmikā vicchittirna saṃbhavati tadā nāstyeva vivādaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:1246: atha saṃbhavati, tadā saṅkara eva nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1257: na hyanekadhāgrahaṇarūpaṃ vaicitryaṃ bhrāntimānapi svalakṣaṇopapanna ityata āha-saṅkarapravṛttistviti
GK16ruyalscu:1260: vastuto hitapovanādyavayavāpekṣayā na jana padasyāvayavino bhedo 'sti /
GK16ruyalscu:1261: itthaṃ ca satyabhede bheda ityevaṃ rūpātiśayoktiratrāstu kiṃ manyakalpanenetyākṣepaniṣkarṣaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:1270: nārāyaṇa iti pariṇatavayobhiḥ śrīvallabha iti taruṇībhaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1272: atra puraḥ praveśāvasare eka eva kṛṣṇo jaratībhiḥ sākṣānmokṣaprado nārāyaṇa itidṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1277: na cātra śaṅkanīyaṃ kautukeneti prayojakāntaropādānānneha rucyādayaḥ prayojakā iti /
GK16ruyalscu:1280: vacasi viṣayabhūte guruḥ prāmāṇikatvāt anullaṅghyo vācaspatiśca /
GK16ruyalscu:1283: ityādau hyeka eva upavarṇyo nāyako vacaḥ-pramukharviṣayabhedādgrahītṛbhedanairapekṣyeṇa rucyādivaśāt anekadhā gṛhyata ityullekhālaṅkāratvam /
GK16ruyalscu:1287: ato lakṣaṇopapannam alaṅkārāntaraṃ sati śleṣe na syāditi nātrollekho yukta ityākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1291: athāpi svarūpeṇa avidyamānasya bādhāsaṃbhavāt bādha evollekhasadbhāve liṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:1293: yata itthamato na tu sarvathā tadabhāva ityalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:1296: atra “anullaṅghyo vacasi, prathīyān urasi, nirmalo yaśasi” iti śleṣābhāve 'pi na ullekhābhāvaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:1297: yasmāditthaṃ tasmādevamādau viṣaye ullekhālaṅkāra eva viśeṣavicchittika iti alaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā śreyān praśasyatara ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1311: yadyapi śleṣato bādho na tathāpyasya nihnavaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1315: nanu mukhaṃ na bhavatīti viṣayāpahnavamātre satyapi nāpahnutirityato
GK16ruyalscu:1318: tathāhi kāvyaprakāśakṛt- “prakṛtaṃ yanniṣidhyānyat sādhyate sā tvapahnutiḥ
GK16ruyalscu:1319: “ nanu yadi sādṛśyādvastvantarapratītirihāpi ko viśeṣaḥ tarhyasya
GK16ruyalscu:1324: ullekhe tu na prakṛtānapahnavamātraṃ viśeṣaḥ kintu anekadhāgrahaṇamapi jñeyam /
GK16ruyalscu:1335: tarhi tṛtīyabhede ko vicchrittiviśeṣaḥ ityata āha-pūrvaka ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:1337: no māṃ prati tatheti prakṛtāpahnavaḥ uttarārdhe 'prakṛtasādhanamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:1338: yadyapi apahnutireṣā tathāpi doṣānuviddhatvāt udāharaṇābhāsa ityata
GK16ruyalscu:1341: apahnotumiṣyasya śaśakasya yaḥ prativastubhūta ulkāpātakiṇaḥ tasyaivāropo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:1343: itthaṃ lakṣaṇopapanno 'pi alaṅkāro doṣānuviddhaḥsan ābhāsī bhavatīti vyutpādya samyagudājihīrṣurāha-tattu yatheti //
GK16ruyalscu:1346: tenonnaddhaḥ utsikto janaḥ śṛṅgārī lokaḥ tasyābhimānaḥsāntvāsahiṣṇutā /
GK16ruyalscu:1348: atra na maṇḍalam api tu ātapatramevetyanvayo ghaṭate ayamapahnavapūrvaka āropaḥ //
GK16ruyalscu:1357: ambhaḥ kaṇairbhaṣṭamityatra hi na muktāphalāni, api tu ambhaḥ kaṇā eveti pratītiḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:2065: sahārtho hi tṛtīyāṃ taṃ guṇatvena prayojayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2066: nanu sahārthatve ka upamānopameyabhāva ityata āha-upamānopameyatvaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:2070: ato vaivakṣikameva na tu vāstavamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2072: nanu dvayoḥ prākaraṇikatvamevāprākaraṇikatvameva vetikiṃ niyāmakamityata āha-sahārthasāmarthyāditi
GK16ruyalscu:2073: nanu tarhi vaivakṣikatve katarat kena rūpeṇa vivakṣyatāmityata
GK16ruyalscu:2076: sahaśabdo hi niyamena tṛtīyāntasya śābdaguṇatvaṃ kalpayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2081: evaṃ nyāyakrame sthite 'pi viśeṣo 'nyo 'syāḥ prayojaka ityāha-tatrāpītyādi
GK16ruyalscu:2082: atiśayoktirapi na sākalyena asyā mūlamityata āha-sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2083: kāryakāraṇapratiniyamaviparyayo 'tra tulyakālatā na tu kāryasya pūrvakālatā sahārthatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2087: kartṛkarmādi sāhityanibandhanenāpi prābhedena prathata iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2091: ato guṇapradhānabhāva nibandhanaivātra bhedapradhānatā, na punarvṛddhikriyānibandhanā /
GK16ruyalscu:2094: aparādhānāṃ ca tṛtīyāntatvāt viśeṣaṇānāmupamānatvaṃ niyatamaparādhā yathā vardhanta iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2095: santāpasya tu pradhānatvādupameyatvaṃ santāpastathā vardhata iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2097: arthaṃ vyapekṣya tu santāpa eva (iva)aparādhā vardhanta ityapi prāpteḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2104: evamatiśayoktimūlatvādilakṣaṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadabhāve sahoktimātraṃ nālaṅkāra iti vyutpādayati-etadviśeṣeti
GK16ruyalscu:2111: dyujanamṛtyoḥ ātpikriyāpekṣayā kartṛtve 'pi tasyopasarjanatvāt neha kartṛsāhityam /
GK16ruyalscu:2112: yā tu (cakra iti)pradhānabhūtā karotikriyā tadapekṣayā karmatvātkarmasāhityametaditi yāvat
GK16ruyalscu:2126: bhārgavāhaṅkṛtikandalasya tu dhanurbhaṅgāntamabhagrasya bhaṅgasamasamayaṃ bhaṅgaḥśrīmatā rāmacandreṇākārīti samanvayāt karmasāhityamiha mālātvenāvatiṣṭhate /
GK16ruyalscu:2137: kañcidarthaṃ vinā yatra śobhanatvaṃ nāsti saikā vinoktaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2139: nanu kasmiṃścit tattvāsatve ityetāvataiva paryātpau (kiṃ?)niṣedhadvayāśrayaṇagauraveṇotyata āha-atra cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2143: na hyasmin sati tattvamasattvaṃvetyuktau vicchittiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:2145: asminsati sattvamasattvaṃ ceti vastuvidhiḥ , sattvalaṅkāraphalatvena prātpe prakāśyata ityāha-evaṃ cānyanivṛttāvapi ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2148: vinayādiṣu ca satsu śrīprabhṛtisadbhāvaḥ phalatvena prakāśyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2150: vinādi śabdābhāve tadarthaṃ sadbhāve vinoktireveti vyutpādayitumāha-atra
GK16ruyalscu:2155: atra tuhināśudarśanaṃ vinā nalinījanma na śobhanamiti pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2159: atra ca hetuhetumadbhāvavyaktayo vinoktereva vicchittiviśeṣādhāyakaḥ na
GK16ruyalscu:2164: loke hi mṛgalocanāṃ vinā vicitravyavahārapratibhāprāgalbhyaṃ nāsti suhṛdā vinā ca sundarāśayatvam
GK16ruyalscu:2171: atha viśeṣaṇavicchittimūlau samāsoktiparikarau prastauti - adhunā viśeṣaṇeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2172: viśeṣaṇa vicchittiśca dvirūpā sābhyaṃ sābhiprāyatā ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2176: yatra viśeṣyāṃśe prakṛtamātraparatā viśeṣaṇasāmyāt punaraprakṛto 'vagamyate sā samāsena saṃkṣepeṇā abhidhānāt samāsoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2186: yadā purgamyatvaṃ prastutaviṣayaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyāt tadānīma prastutapraśaṃsā, yadā tvaprastutaviṣayaṃ tadā samāsoktiriti vivekaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2187: aprastutasya gamyatve yadi viśeṣyasyāpi sāmyaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-viśeṣyasyāpi sāmye śleṣaprāpteriti /
GK16ruyalscu:2189: nanu śleṣālaṅkāraḥ śabdaśaktimūladhvaniśceti triṣu viṣayeṣvapyasti śliṣṭapadāpanibandhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2190: tatra yadā śleṣaḥ tadārthadvayasya niyamena vācyatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2191: vācyatvaṃ caivaṃ saṃbhavati-yadārthau dvāvapi prākaraṇikau staḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2192: aprākaraṇikau vā tadā viṣeṣaṇaviṣyāṃśayordvayorapi śliṣṭapadopanibandhāt śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2194: atha yadaikasya prākaraṇikatvamitarasya aprākaraṇikatvaṃ tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthak śabdopādānabalādeva śleṣālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2200: yadā punaḥ prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śliṣṭatā tadā tāvanna samāsoktiḥ viśeṣaṇamātrasāmyalakṣaṇā yataḥ śleṣālaṅkāratvaprātpirapi /
GK16ruyalscu:2201: katham? tatrārthadvayasya vācyataiva lakṣaṇaṃ yataḥ, na hyatra dvayorvācyatopapattiḥ prakaraṇapakṣapātinyā abhidhāyā aprākaraṇiker'the
GK16ruyalscu:2202: sparśābhāvāt aprākaraṇikasya samanvayasamanantara pratītikatvāt śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ śleṣeṇa viṣayagrāsaprasaṅgācca /
GK16ruyalscu:2206: yato viśeṣaṇasāmyādaprastutor'thaḥ pratīyate, ato viśeṣyāṃśe saṃsparśābhāvādviśeṣyaṃ prakṛtārthaṃ na svena rūpeṇa rūpavantaṃ kartumīṣṭe kindu viśeṣaṇāṃśapratītaṃ svavyavahāraṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśapratīte prakṛtārthavyavahāre 'vacchredakatvena samāropayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2211: nanu yadā rūpasamāropaḥ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-rūpasamāropetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2235: upoḍharāgatvādiśliṣṭa viśeṣaṇamahinmā khalvatra niśāśaśinau nāyakavyavahāra viśiṣṭau pratīyete
GK16ruyalscu:2236: nanu katham atra nirjñāyate vyavahārasamāropo na rūpasamāropa ityata āha-aparityaktetyādi
GK16ruyalscu:2237: yadi rūpasamāropastadā prakṛtau rūpakanyāyena svaṃ svaṃ rūpamavacchrāditatvena parityajya yadavacchrādakamupamānarūpaṃ tādrūpyamupagṛhṇāti /
GK16ruyalscu:2238: iha punarviśeṣyāṃśe niṣpratiyogikatayā jñātayorata evāparityakta sva rūpayoḥ niśāśaśinorviśeṣaṇasāmyāvagamitena nāyakatvadharmeṇa viśiṣṭatayā pratīteḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2242: iha tanutvādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmubhayatraikārthatāsāmyaṃ na tu śliṣṭatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2244: nanu tanutvādidharmasāmyāt kathaṃ latāvyavahārapratītirityata āha-tatra ca lataiketyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2245: vikāso hi latāyā eva tatsamāropo lolākṣyā latāvyavahārapratīteḥ kāraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:2247: yathaivaṃ viśeṣaṇasādhāraṇyaṃ dharmasamāropaśca vyavahārasamāropasya kāraṇaṃ tathā kāryasamāropo 'pīti vyutpādayutumāha-evaṃ ca kāryetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2248: kāryasamāropanibandhano hi bheda iha dharmasamāropanītyā sujñānaḥ upari ca śuddhatvena pṛthagrāśīkariṣyati
GK16ruyalscu:2257: atrānapekṣitākhyāne vākye śravaṇa samanantarameva dantaprabhāpuṣpacitatvādinā hetunā hariṇekṣaṇāyāḥ suveṣatā pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2259: atha dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairiti madhyamapadalopi samāsāntarapratyāyitaiḥ puṣpapallavādibhiḥ viśeṣaṇāsāmyadaśāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2263: rūpasamārope tu rūpakamiti pratipāditam yataḥ ataḥ pratīto 'pi
GK16ruyalscu:2265: nanvevamādau prāgupamāsamāsāsasamāśrayaṇanimittaṃ yadi suveṣatvādinā nopāttaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-atraiva parītetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2267: iha dantaprabhāpuṣpāṇīvetyādinā kimupamāsamāsaḥ, uta dantaprabhā eva
GK16ruyalscu:2268: puṣpāṇītyādiko rūpakasamāsa iti sandehaḥ, upamārūpakayoḥ sādhakabādhakābhāvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2270: na ca mantavyaṃ samāsaḥ sandeho papanna iti, sandehasya kavipratibhotthā pitasya vicchrittirūpatvāt
GK16ruyalscu:2272: atha sandehopaśamakāle dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairityādi pūrvavadeva madhyamapadalopasamāsaḥ latāvyavahārapratītau samāsoktāveva viśrantiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2273: itthaṃ ca sati upamā samāsagarbhatayā saṅkarasamāsagarbhatayā ca samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ dvidhā darśito mantavyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2274: nanu kevalarūpakasamāsāśrayeṇāpi samāsoktibhedo 'yaṃ kiṃ neṣyata ityata
GK16ruyalscu:2276: prāk rūpakasamāse atha tadgarbhatayopamāsamāsāśraye yadyapi viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:2277: bhavatyeva, tathāpi na tat samāsokteḥ prayojakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2280: nanu upamāsamāse saṅkarasamāse ca samāsoktivaiparthyaṃ kiṃ na
GK16ruyalscu:2287: ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye rūpakaprātpau samāsokte prātpiriti sodāharaṇaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:2290: payodo vidyunnayanairniśāyāmabhisārikāyāḥ mukhaṃ nirīkṣya dhārānipātaiḥ saha candro mayā vānta iti dhiyevārtataraṃ rarāsetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2294: ataḥ puruṣānusāreṇa yojane vidyuta eva nayanānīti rūpakameva na punarupamā saṅkaro vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2296: taccedamārtataraṃ rarāseti pratīyamānotprekṣāyā eva nimittaṃ samāsokte raprātpireveti bhāvaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2300: eṣu rūpaṇasāmarthyānmadano mahārājatayā madhuśca śrīkaraṇāgraṇītvena rūpitaḥ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2302: nanu patrāṇīvetyādirupamā kiṃ na syādityata āha-dvirephamaṣītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2303: maṣīyogo hi madhāvasaṃbhavannupamā samāsaṃbādhitvā gaṇakavṛtteḥ saṃbhavastadanusāreṇa rūpakasamāsaṃ sādhayatīti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:2304: nanu samāsoktiprastāve kiṃ sodāharaṇaṃ rūpakabhedapradarśanenetyata āha-asya ca pracura ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2317: itthaṃ viśeṣaṇasāmyātpañcaprakāratvasiddhā vavāntaraṃ viśeṣasahitāmimāṃ punastrirāśikatayā saṃcaṣṭe-itthaṃ śuddhakāryetyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:2318: kāryasya śuddhatvaṃ nāma nirūpita viśeṣaṇasāmyā saṃkīrṇatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2321: tacca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ śuddhakāryasamārope satyupacaritaṃ, yathā vilikhatītyādāvudāhariṣyamāṇepadye sa eko rāśiḥ , yadā punaridamanupacaritaṃ tadā pañcadhodāhṛtam prāk sa dvitīyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2323: anupacaritaviśeṣaṇasāmyanibandhanasya nyāyanirbharatvena prāk pradarśanaṃ pañcavidhatvena kṛtamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2325: nanu śuddhakāryasamārope viśeṣaṇasānyamupacaritam , anyadātvanupacaritaṃ anugatamekarūpaṃ tu prayojanaṃ nānupaśyāma ityata āha-sarvatra cātretyādi
GK16ruyalscu:2327: tasya cāturvidhyaṃ darśayati-sa ca laukika ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2329: anena ca vyavahārasamāropacāturvidhyena rāśitrayamapi pratyekaṃ caturdhā prathate /
GK16ruyalscu:2335: atropacaritatvādaprastutāvagatau viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ nātibaddhabharam api tu śuddhakāryasamāropa eva ityāha-atra patrāvalītyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2346: eṣitriṣu rāśiṣu vyavahārasamāropa vaicitryanibandhanāt bhedānupadarśayitukāma āha-vyavahārasamāropetyādi
GK16ruyalscu:2361: jāgare viśvaḥ prathamaḥ , svapne taijaso dvitīyaḥ, sauṣupte prājñastṛtīya iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2366: taistava sakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ (manye)parameśvarasya hi sarvavṛttiṣvakatvaṃ rūpamavyayatvaṃ asaṃkhyatā na kutaścidapideśakālāderbheda iti idameva
GK16ruyalscu:2369: atha sarvāsu kārikādivṛttiṣvekatvādisaṃkhyārahitamavyaye hi syāditi pratiyogyekatvaṃ nāsti kiṃ tvabhedaikatvamevar /
GK16ruyalscu:2370: idṛśamavyayaṃ paśyadbhiḥ paratvajuṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paratvalakṣaṇāyāḥ vibhakteḥ prathamāderlopaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2378: arthādanāpātādarthāpatterna ca na yaditi pramāṇānuktāvapi vastutar idṛśi lāvaṇye mīmāṃsādisiddhādṛṣṭādivastusamāropaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2389: yadvā candramasa iti viśeṣyādhyāhārādoṣadhipaterityetat viśeṣaṇātayā vivakṣiṇīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2391: ye tātparyavidaḥ ye cānumānarasikāḥ tairapi (avi)jñeyaścāsau pārimityaṃ jahāti na vaktuṃ śakyaḥ na ca lakṣayituṃ kintu guruvaraḥ !tava
GK16ruyalscu:2393: atra guṇagaṇe śṛṅgārādirasavyavahāraḥ samāropita ityāha-atra bharatetyādi
GK16ruyalscu:2398: tātparyaṃ hi nāma abhihitānvayamate samanvayaśaktiḥ abhidhottīrṇā samanvayamātra viśrāntayānayā samanvayasamanantara pratītiko raso na jñāyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2401: mukhyārthabādhādyabhāvannāpi lakṣyaḥ api tu vedyāntaravigalanādaparimitaḥsan abhidhālakṣaṇātātparyottīrṇena vyañjanākhyena kāvyaikagāminā śāstrāntarāpūrveṇa vyāpāreṇa viṣayīkriyamāṇo laukikatvāt anukāryamabhinayaprayāsanighnatvāt anukartāraṃ ca parihṛtya sahṛdayaikagata iti budhairavasīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2404: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya kṛta iti tata evāvadhārya ityalam /
GK16ruyalscu:2407: atraidupahvaram-vāgdevatā hi parā paśyantī madhyamāvaikharī ceti catuṣpadaparimitā /
GK16ruyalscu:2408: tatra nāmarūpātmakaṃ prapañcaṃ svātmanyupasaṃhṛtya svarūpajyotīrūpiṇī jāgaritādidhāmatrayollaṅghinī parā /
GK16ruyalscu:2409: nāmarūpaprapañcollāsanāya prāthamikaprāṇaparispantābhimāninī kandamandirā maṇipūrakāvadhiprasarantī bījabhāvāpannanirvibhāgavarṇamayīviśvābhimukhī bhavantī sauṣutpavṛttiḥ paśyantī /
GK16ruyalscu:2410: pārāyāḥ sakāśāduditā maṇipūrakāt anāhatāvadhi prāṇaparispandotkṣubhitabuddhivṛttyabhimāninī varṇapadādiparigrahāntaḥsaṃjalapātmikā paśyantīprabhāvā svapnavṛttirmadhyamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2413: atha saṃhārāvasare jāgaritalayapuraskāreṇa vaikharī madhyamāyāṃ līyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2415: madhyamā svapnalayapuraskāreṇa paśyantyām, sā ca sauṣutpalayapuraskāreṇa
GK16ruyalscu:2417: itthaṃ ca sati śaktimānātmā parāyāṃ turīyāṃ , paśyantyāṃ prājñāḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:2420: prabho!vaśyendriyatayā prabhavanaśīla! tava parayā devyā saha krīḍādṛḍhāliṅgane aprayāsena tādṛśī samādhisāmarasye pravṛtte bāhyā vāk kathaṃ cāṭūccāraṇācāpalaṃ sphuṭatālvoṣṭhapuṭavyāpāramakhatatāṃ kathaṃ nāma vitanutāṃ cāpalakathaiva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2421: kuto nāstītyata āha-ābhyantarī paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati,
GK16ruyalscu:2426: tatra vaikharī kathaṃ nāma pravartatām iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2428: yathā parayodevyā paṭṭamahiṣyā saha tava kriḍādṛḍhāliṅgane pravartamāne anyā kācidābhyantarī ābhyantaratvādeva yuvayorāliṅganaṃ paśyantī trapayevātmānaṃ yatra tirayati gopayati /
GK16ruyalscu:2430: madhyamāvṛttirmadhuradhvaniḥ yathā bhavati tathā ujjihāsārasāt truṭyatiṣa
GK16ruyalscu:2432: tatra bāhyā parigrahaveśyā cāṭūccāraṇacāpalaṃ kathaṃ vitanutāmiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2438: śuddhakāryasamārope hi vilikhati kucāvityādau yat kucavilekhanādi
GK16ruyalscu:2439: ha(ṭha)kā(mu)kakāryaṃ tasya yadyapi na mukhyatayā yat khadirādiviśeṣaṇatvaṃ, athāpyupacāreṇa viśeṣaṇīkaraṇaṃ , tat
GK16ruyalscu:2442: atha yatra samāsokterasāmañjasyaṃ tatra nyāyasañcāreṇa samañcāreṇa
GK16ruyalscu:2445: ārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ pāṇḍupayodhareṇa dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī śaradravestāpabhabhyadhikaṃ cakāra /
GK16ruyalscu:2457: aindraṃ dhanuḥ śarada evaviśeṣaṇaṃ na nāyikāyāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2458: nanvārdranakhakṣatābhamiti viśeṣaṇaupamyādekadeśavivartinyupamā śaradi tatsāmarthyādinduravyoḥ nāyakatvapratītirastvityata āha-na caikadeśeti /
GK16ruyalscu:2467: nanu yadyekadeśavivartinyupamāyā iha saṃbhavaḥ tadaryupamālaṅkārasyaiva prātpirma samāsokterityata āha-athātretyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2472: api tu raviśaśinoreva nāyakatvavyavahāre pratītiḥ , tayorevāsyāṃ śaradi nāyakatvopacārāt
GK16ruyalscu:2473: itthaṃ samāsoktiprātpau, tadanusāreṇa śabdanyāso nyāyya ityata
GK16ruyalscu:2479: anyaniṣṭhasya dharmasyānyatra saṃcāraṇaṃ kutra dṛṣṭamityata āha-yathā
GK16ruyalscu:2481: dadhnā juhotītyatra hi havanagatatvena vidhiḥ pratītaḥ sa tvagnihotraṃ juhotītya(ta)eva siddha iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2485: atha yatra nyāyataḥ samāsoktimapohya ekadeśavivartinyupamaiva prathate taṃ viṣayaṃ darśayitumāha-iha punariti /
GK16ruyalscu:2487: atra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītau nimittaṃ vivacayati-saraḥ śriyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:2490: nāyikāpyatra saraḥ śriyāmupamānatayā, na tu vyavahārasasāropeṇa
GK16ruyalscu:2491: saraḥśrīdharmatayā ata evaṃvidhe viṣaye gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinī upamaivopāsyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2495: nanu pūrvamekadeśavivartinyupamā nirākṛtā, samprati sādhiteti vyāghāta
GK16ruyalscu:2497: dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīvetyādi samāsenoktāyāmupamāyāṃ satyāmapi dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpairivetyādi samāsāntaramahimnā viśeṣaṇasāmyamupapadyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2499: samprati tu netrairivetyatra gatyantarābhāvādekadeśavivartinyupamaiva vyavasthāpiteti vyaghātābhāvāt sarvamavadātam /
GK16ruyalscu:2500: athārthāntaranyāsa prabhāvitāyāmasyāṃ vaicitryāntaraṃ astītyāha - sā cetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2509: upagūḍhatvaṃ śāntataṭitkaṭākṣatvaṃ ca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ tadutthāpitayā samāsoktyā nāyakavyavahārapratītiḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2510: tathā sati samāsoktyāliṅgito yo 'yaṃ viśeṣātmā sa sāmānyātmanā
GK16ruyalscu:2513: paribhraṣṭapayodharāṇāmiti śleṣavaśādupagūḍha iti viśeṣaṇaṃ sādhāraṇatayā sphuṭam /
GK16ruyalscu:2517: strīliṅgapulliṅganirdeśagarbheṇa bhajanarūpeṇa kāryeṇotthāpitayā samāsoktyā samāropitanāyakavyavahāreṇa viśeṣātmanā ravisandhyāvṛttāntena samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2519: veṣṭanā veṣṭanaṃ yasya mandaragireḥ, pādaḥ paryantaparvataḥ caraṇaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:2522: mandākinīsamāropaḥ, tasyāśca yatprāntaparvataveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanameveti, pādaśabdaśleṣotthayā bhede 'bhedaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2541: prasannagaṃbhīratvaṃ nāma padānāṃ vyāṅgyārthagarbhīkāra eva na tu vyaṅgyasya vācyātiśāyitā
GK16ruyalscu:2550: kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca na niḥsahāyasya /
GK16ruyalscu:2554: jīvatā eva na tu mūrcchitasya mṛtasya vā /
GK16ruyalscu:2564: arthadvayasya yadā prākaraṇikatvamaprākaraṇikatvameva vā tadā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ śabdasāmye śleṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2565: yadā tūbhayamayatvaṃ arthadvayasya tadā viśeṣyāṃśe pṛthagupādāne śleṣa iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2571: viśeṣyāṃśe 'pi śabdasāmyaṃ tadā arthaprakaraṇādinā abhidhāniyāsyāt na tu
GK16ruyalscu:2573: anekārtho hi śabdaḥ prakaraṇādinā prākaraṇika evārthe niyamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2574: ādye tu prakāradvaye niyamahetvabhāvāt dvāvapi vācyau /
GK16ruyalscu:2575: itthaṃ sati vikalpo vyavatiṣṭhata ityāha-ata eveti /
GK16ruyalscu:2580: abhavena asaṃsāreṇa balidaityajitkāyaḥ purāmṛtasaṃvibhāgakāle strīkṛtaḥ strībhāvaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2583: agaṃ govardhanaṃ gāṃ mahīṃ ca yaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ varāhāvatāre adhārayat /
GK16ruyalscu:2584: yasya ca stutyaṃ nāma amaraḥ śaśimacchirohara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2588: atha yena dhvastamanobhavena nāśitamanmathena balijitkāyaḥ viṣṇorvapuḥ purāṇāṃ saṃharaṇe astrīkṛtaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2589: yaścedvṛndrakalāvat stutyaṃ ca nāma hara ityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2593: lubdhairmadhulaṃpaṭaiḥ vyādhaiśca bhūriti kriyāviśeṣaṇam ekadā śilīmukhairbhramaraiḥ anyadā bhūribāṇaiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2619: puṣpeṣu kusumānatareṣu ruciṃ śobhāṃ puṣpabāṇapriyatāṃ ca /
GK16ruyalscu:2623: alaṅkārāntareṣvaprāpteṣu anārabhyamāṇo 'yaṃ niravakāśatvāt balīyāniti bādhitvā tatpratibhāmātra mutpādayatīti kecit /
GK16ruyalscu:2625: anye punaḥ “yena dhvastamanobhavene”ti alaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣayaḥ iti sāvakāśatvānnānyabādhakaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2626: ato 'nyasampāte saṅkaraḥ nyāyato vā daurbalye bādhyatvamityāhuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2632: yatrobhayarūpānekārthagocaratvaṃ tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ tatra tu dīpakaṃ prabhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:2636: yata itthaṃ nāsya viviktaviṣayatā ato 'laṅkārāntarāṇi śleṣabādhitāni pratibhāmātrāvaśeṣāṇi bhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2637: itthaṃ sati vivakto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena
GK16ruyalscu:2639: itthaṃ vivikto yaḥśāṅkito viṣayaḥ so 'pi avivikta evetyāha-yena
GK16ruyalscu:2642: alaṅkāryalaṅkaraṇabhāvo hi āśrayāśrayibhāvenopapanno loke karṇāśritaḥ karṇālaṅkāra iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2643: ato raktacchradetyādāvarthāśrayaṇādarthālaṅkāro 'yaṃ , nālamityādau tu sphuṭaḥśabdabheda iti śabdālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2644: nanu arthabhede śabdabhedo 'pi bhinna eveti raktacchradamityādāvapi na śabdaikyamityada āha-yadyapītyādi
GK16ruyalscu:2648: ataḥ sāhityasaraṇeḥ pratītyaikasāratvāt śabdaikyapratipādakadarśanāvaṣṭāmbhācca nāsti śabdabhedaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2662: itthaṃ niravakāśatvobhayālaṅkāratvasiddhau sakalakalamityādau śleṣa eva nopamā /
GK16ruyalscu:2666: nanu niravakāśatvācchraleṣaścedvādhakaḥ, tarhi rūpakasamāsoktyoḥ kuto ca bādha ityata āha-śleṣagarbhetvityādi
GK16ruyalscu:2667: rūpakaṃ hi siddhaśleṣamutthāpya svasvarūpa eva viśrāmyatīti śleṣabādhakaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2668: tatrāpi yadi śleṣaḥ pūrvasiddho rūpakamutthāpya yadi svarūpe viśrāmyati,
GK16ruyalscu:2672: tadā rūpakameva syādanyathā śleṣa iṣyate // iti //
GK16ruyalscu:2675: samāsoktau tu śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇanibandhanāyāṃ viśeṣyāṃśasya gamyatvāt samāsoktireva bādhikā /
GK16ruyalscu:2679: jagatsu trayīmayatvena prathito 'pi vivasvān vāruṇīṃ prati yadagamat /
GK16ruyalscu:2682: pātityaṃ adhaḥ pradeśasaṃyogaḥ upahatiśca patitatvādeva śuddhyaibaḍavāgnimadhyaṃ viveśetyarthaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2684: loketrayīmayasya sato vāruṇī sparśato yau pati tatvāgrapraveśau, tābhyāṃ śleṣamūlayātiśayoktyā dve api vivasvatkriye 'dhyasite /
GK16ruyalscu:2686: yadyapyekaiva kriyā kartṛbhedabhinnā satyabhedenādhyavasitā sa tu
GK16ruyalscu:2689: ata eveti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭo yo virodhālaṅkāraḥ viruddhacaraṇābhāsarūpaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2694: ato virodhotprekṣālaṅkāyostulyakālatā ekavṛttantaḥ pā(ti)tā, uttarakālaṃ tu virodhopaśama iti pratītikramaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2695: itthañca sati śleṣaḥ sarvabādhakaḥsan virodhālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā pratibhāmātreṇāvasthāpayati
GK16ruyalscu:2698: yatra tu nāṭakādau bhāvyarthopakṣepātmakaṃ bījanyāsalakṣaṇaṃ sūcakatvaṃ tatra mīmāṃsārthamāha-yatra tvityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2710: śleṣadhvanivyatirekiṇī gatirapi nāsti, tatra kiṃ kartavyamityākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2712: śleṣastu dvayorvācyatvābhāvāt sarvathā na pravartata iti dhvaneḥ eva viṣayo 'yam /
GK16ruyalscu:2714: śabdaśaktimūle hi dhvanau vācyapratīyamānayoḥ sambandhābhāvāt sambandhāyaupamyaklṝtpiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2715: sa(ca)sambandhaḥ aupamyānapekṣayā prakārāntareṇa yadi sūpapādaḥ tarhi upamādhvanau ko 'bhiniveśaḥ? na kārya eva, yato vastudhvanirapi tatra
GK16ruyalscu:2717: ata eva dhvanikṛtā śabdaśaktimūlo dhvaniḥ alaṅkārarūpo vasturūpaśceti dvidhā nyāyata uktaḥ- alaṅkāro 'tha vastveva śabdādyatrāvabhāsate /
GK16ruyalscu:2718: pradhānatvena sa jñeyaḥ śabdaśaktyudbhavo dvidhā // iti //
GK16ruyalscu:2720: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛte 'pi sūcakatvasambandhāt śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniravaseyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2723: kauśaikadik ulūkadiśā harṣātmikā te hi prabhāte harṣeṇa kūjanti /
GK16ruyalscu:2724: yadvā kauśika indraḥ , tasya dik prācī tadvijṛmbhaṇavaśāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2726: ākāśaṃ rāṣṭrasamaṃ icchyā tyaktvā valkalasadṛśadhūsarakāntidharaścandraḥ astaśailaṃ yau /
GK16ruyalscu:2727: atha tatkāntāpi niśā samullāsibhiralikulaiḥ krandhantaṃ sutamiva kumudākaraṃ sāntvayantī tena saha kṣipraṃ pratasthe /
GK16ruyalscu:2728: sūcanīye tvarthe viśvāmitrakrodhavaśāt icchyā rāṣṭraṃ tyaktvā vārāṇasīṃ prasthitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2729: tatkāntāpyauśīnarī krandantaṃ rohitāśvaṃ sutaṃ santvayantī tenaiva saha prasthiteti /
GK16ruyalscu:2731: nanu dhūsarakāntivalakaleti sutamiveti ca aupamyasambandhasadbhāvāt kathamayaṃ vastudhvanirityata āha-valkalasūtābhyāṃ tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:2734: ataḥ prakṛtena saha sūcanīyasya sūcanasambandhācca śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvanireva /
GK16ruyalscu:2736: atha yatra na tulyayogitā nāpi dīpakaṃ tatrāpi nāstyalaṅkārāntaravivikto 'sya viṣaya iti darśayituṃ āha-iheti /
GK16ruyalscu:2737: atra viśeṣaṇānāṃ alakākarṣavaktrāsañjanādīnāṃ vallabhaparatayā prathamaṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2738: atha itthaṃ vadantyāste lajjā pralīneti sakhīvyavahāke nahi nahīti vallabhasya nihnāvapuraḥsaraṃ kūrpāsakavalyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2739: atra hi na tulyayogitā dīpakaṃ vā ato vivikto 'yaṃ śleṣaviṣaya iti na
GK16ruyalscu:2743: apahnavo hi vastutaḥsādṛśyārthaṃ pravarttate iha tu sādṛśyaṃ apahnavāya pravṛttimiti nāyamapahnava iti codyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2756: itthaṃ nyāyanirbhagharatayā anena prapañcito 'pi kāvyaprakāśakṛtā pratipadaṃ khaṇḍito 'yaṃ śleṣo 'laṃṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2758: saṃpradāyaprakāśinyāṃ tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vitatya darśitā iti tat evāvadhāryāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2761: aprastutāt sā mānyaviśeṣabhāve kāryakāraṇabhāve sārūpye ca prastutapratītā vaprastutapraśaṃsā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvādi saṃbandhāvalambenāprastutāt prastutāvagatau aprastutapraśaṃsā /
GK16ruyalscu:2766: tatra sāmānyādviśeṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sārūpyaṃ ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:2767: tatra sāmānyadviśesaṣasya viśeṣādvā sāmānyasya pratītiriti dvaividhyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2769: sārūpye tu yadyapi naivam, ataḥ pañcaprakāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2771: athasarvaiveyaṃ vācyasya saṃbhavena ubhayarūpatayā ceti tridhā /
GK16ruyalscu:2772: śliṣṭaśabdaprayoge tu śleṣeṇa na bādhyate prastutasyāvācyatvāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2782: kiṃ tat? kamalinīpatre pāthasaḥ kaṇaṃ muktāmaṇirityāmaṃsteti yat /
GK16ruyalscu:2784: sa evātijaḍaḥ yastu muktāmaṇidhiyā'dīyamāne tatra pāthaḥkaṇe aṅgulyagrakriyāpravilayini satimama maṇiruḍaḍīya gata iti antaḥśucā na nidrāti /
GK16ruyalscu:2787: kimiyaṃ prapadyata iti paśyāma iti dhiyā saṃlāpaparihārādirūpaṃ sthairyaṃ mayālambitam /
GK16ruyalscu:2788: tayā tu “ayaṃ khalu śaṭhaḥ māṃ na kimapyālapatīti”kopa āśritaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2789: ityanyonyavailakṣaṇyena darśanacature tasminnavasthāntare mayā vyājena hasitaṃ, tayāpi dhairyataharo bāṣpo muktaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2793: indiriti-indurañjanena litpa ivetyanena mukhasya saundaryaṃ, mṛgīṇāṃ dṛṣṭīrjaḍitaiveti dṛkvāñcalyaṃ, vidrumadalaṃ pramlānāruṇimeveti adharaprabhā, kokilavadhūkaṇṭheṣu kāryaśyaṃ prastutameveti
GK16ruyalscu:2794: snigdhakaṇṭhatā, barhāḥsagarhā iveti ca keśabhāravaipulyaṃ pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2798: yena lambālaka iti-atra lambālakatvādinā kāryeṇa gajāsuravadharūpakāraṇapratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2803: dvayorapi prastutatve kāraṇāpekṣayā kāryopavarṇanasya sacamatkāratve taddvārā kāraṇapratyāyanaṃ paryāyoktaviṣayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2808: itthaṃ ca sati prakṛtasyaca sataur'thasya svopaskārāya prakṛtānatarāgūraṇe paryāyoktameveci prathanāya punarāha-tataśca anayetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2814: atra rājaśukavṛttasyāpi nāyakapratāpāṅgatayā prakṛtatvāt paryāyoktameva boddhavyam /
GK16ruyalscu:2817: idṛśi viṣaye anyeṣāmaprastutapraśaṃsāsātve buddhāvapi na virodhaḥ kaścit /
GK16ruyalscu:2819: kāryasyāprastutatve tu aprastutapraśaṃseti vibhāgasyānā kūlatvāt ityabhiprāyeṇāha-sarvatheti
GK16ruyalscu:2820: atha etāni sādharmyodāharaṇatvena vijñeyānītyāha-etāni sādharmya iti /
GK16ruyalscu:2822: sārūpyahetukaṃ tu bhedam anayā nītyā sādharmyeṇa sujñānatvātāṃ
GK16ruyalscu:2833: pramukha eva śākoṭakavṛttasya āropitatva pratīteryujyata evāsambhavaḥ vācyasya jahatsvārthalakṣaṇāmūlatvena atyantatiraskārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:2855: ābhyāṃ sambandhābhyāṃ samarthyatvena nirdiṣṭasya prakṛtasya samarthanamarthāntaranyāsa ityarthaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:2867: atra guṇasannipāte doṣanimajjanalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ sādharmyeṇa viśeṣasamarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2869: puṃsāṃ lokottaraṃ caritameva pratiṣṭhām arpayati audāryaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2875: sahaseti-kriyā dhyavasāyaḥ sahasāvidhānarūpo hyāvivekaḥ āpadāṃ padam anenāpatpadatvarūpaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvarūpasya kāraṇasya vaidharmyeṇa samarthakam /
GK16ruyalscu:2877: sahasāvidhānābhāvātmano vimṛśyakāritvasya kāraṇasya sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sādharmyeṇa /
GK16ruyalscu:2882: pṛthvīti-dvitayaṃ pṛthvī bhujaṅgarūpaṃ tat tritaye kūrmarāja yuktadvitayātmani /
GK16ruyalscu:2886: aho hīti-āyuṣā bahvaparāddhaṃ hi suhyadaḥ parābhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā ridṛśamapriyaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:2888: ta evara hidhanyā, suhṛtparābhavamaṭṭaṣṭvā ye kṣayaṃ gatāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2895: samarthyatve na nirdiṣṭaḥ prakṛto yaḥ samarthyate /
GK16ruyalscu:2917: stutyā nindāyā gamyatve ekā nindayā stutestvanyā /
GK16ruyalscu:2918: ato vyājarūpāstutiḥ vyājena stutiriti ca vigrahaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2921: anugamena arthānvayena dvitīyā tu nindāvyājena stutiriti āha-yatrāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:2923: nanu stutinindayorgamyāṃśasya prastutatvāda prastutapraśaṃsātaḥ ko bheda ityata āha-stutinindeti
GK16ruyalscu:2926: sa hi kadācideva parasya hitamādhāt tvaṃ tu ye yāvantastṛṣyanti,
GK16ruyalscu:2927: tebhyaḥsarvebhya eva vaimukhyalabdhānāmayaśobhārāṇaṃ prodvahane maroḥsāhāyarkaṃ karoṣi /
GK16ruyalscu:2931: urvīvalayatilaka indulakṣmādiṣu śyāmaleṣu satsu tvadyaśobhirnakiñciddhavalitaṃ iti stutirgamyate
GK16ruyalscu:2934: yatra tu gamyāṃśasya nyagbhāvastatra nāsyāḥsāmañjasyamiti darśayitumāha-kiṃ vṛttāntairiti
GK16ruyalscu:2935: atra vallabhā bhramati hantetyuktyā nindāyāḥsutiparyavasāyitvaṃ na
GK16ruyalscu:2944: uktavakṣyamāṇayoḥ prākaraṇikayoḥ viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepaḥ // RuAss_38 //
GK16ruyalscu:2945: uktasya vakṣyamāṇasya vā prākaraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyarthaṃ ābhāsato niṣedhanam ākṣepaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2949: ata eva vidheyasya sa kṛtaḥ aviṣaye pravartita ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2954: gajo hi snāta eva san sadyo dhūlidhūsaro bhavati /
GK16ruyalscu:2957: tatra kasya kaḥ prakāra ityata āha-uktaviṣayatvenetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:2974: bālaka! nāhaṃ dūti tasyāḥ priyo 'sīti nāsmākaṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:2977: yati prasīdeti brūyāmasati kopa idaṃ vaco na ghaṭate /
GK16ruyalscu:2978: evaṃ na punaḥ kariṣyāmīti cedbrūyāṃ tathā vidyamānasyābhyupagamaḥ, na me doṣo 'stīti cedbrūyāṃ tvaṃ punaridaṃ doṣābhāvavaco mṛṣetijñāsyāsi /
GK16ruyalscu:2979: ataḥ kiṃ vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi /
GK16ruyalscu:2985: athavā vyatikrāma kiṃ bhaṇama iti tu tasyaiva pratyāsannataratvādbhaṇatyanarhatā /
GK16ruyalscu:2987: atra virahavedanāvaśāt jyotsnāpikavacaḥ prabhṛtīnāṃ tamaḥkrakacādirūpāpattyā yato durantatā
GK16ruyalscu:2998: udīryamāṇasya idaṃ na ghaṭata iti niṣedhamukhenaiva /
GK16ruyalscu:3000: kiṃ bhaṇāma iti sāmānyadvāreṇa vaktumiṣṭasya jīvitasaṃśayādeḥ svarūpata eva bhaṇitiniṣedha ityarthavaśādāgūraṇam ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3001: sā nūnamityaṃ śoktau jīvituṃ na śaknomītyaṃśāntarasya svarūpato bhaṇitiniṣedhādāgūraṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3006: nanu niṣedhākṣepaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-vidhinā tviti /
GK16ruyalscu:3009: yata itthaṃ niṣedhena vidherākṣepaḥ atar idṛśi viṣaye nālaṅkāntaramityata āha-tataśceti
GK16ruyalscu:3014: atra hyaparityājyatādi bālyāderna niṣedhakamapi tu tasya sādhakameveti nākṣepabuddhiḥ kāryā
GK16ruyalscu:3017: tasmāt kāraṇāt saukaryeṇa viśeṣasiddhyarthaṃ tasya niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepokteḥ
GK16ruyalscu:3019: ato yatra niṣedho vāstavo na tatrākṣepa iti sodāharaṇaṃ darśayati-iha
GK16ruyalscu:3021: atra pūrva śloke daityā iva kāvyārthacorā luṇṭanāya yatpraguṇībhavanti,
GK16ruyalscu:3023: uttaraśloke tu sarve yathecchaṃ gṛhṇantu loke 'pi na kṣatiriti,
GK16ruyalscu:3025: tathā vāyoḥ kārāgṛhakḷptyai kandarāsu śilākavāṭadānaṃ vihitaṃ, uttaraśloke evaṃ cintārūpaṃ dainyaṃ mṛṣā kirātā marutāsaha nirodhanavairaṃ necchrandīti kavāṭadānaṃ sākṣānniṣedhyata iti naitadyugalakayugamākṣepodāharaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3029: gaṇikā dhanaparāyaṇāḥ satyaḥ sarvam asāmpratamācaranti yataḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3030: atastvayā viśvāso na kārya iti gaṇikāyā evoktau viśvāsaniṣedha ābhāsāyate
GK16ruyalscu:3043: anvayavyatikekāvasthāyino vastuno nyāyyo 'pi anvayavyatirekāvasthāyitayā samāna iti bhāvaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:3046: prākaraṇikasya viśeṣapratītyarthamiti anuvartate, na tu prākaraṇikayoriti,
GK16ruyalscu:3055: yato vidhirayaṃ ābhāsamāno niṣedhe vyajyamāna upakaraṇam ato vidhyābhāsena vyañjakenāyaṃ nirūpyamāṇo niṣedha ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3056: sa cāniṣṭaviśeṣe paryavasyan ākṣepālaṅkāra iti yojanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3064: gacchasi cedityanena, jigamiṣāsti cet nāhaṃ nirākaromi iti gamyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3065: gacchretyatra tu tena puraskṛto vidhirmamāpi tatraiva gatirbhūyāditi tu prāṇanairāśyāviṣkārān niṣedhapratyāyanam /
GK16ruyalscu:3074: gacchasicedityukto hi kiṃ tatra gamanena mama saṃvijñānetyādi pratīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3081: haṃso hi śithilāṃsaḥsan saviśeṣaṃ ramyo bhavati, antardhavalimā viṣkārāt /
GK16ruyalscu:3084: anabhipretasyaiva sato gamanasya no kiñciktathanīyamastīti pramukha evābhyupagamaḥ pratīyate
GK16ruyalscu:3085: itthaṃ ca sati vidhirayaṃ aniṣṭatvenābhāsamāno niṣedhāgūraṇātmana ākṣepasyāṅgam /
GK16ruyalscu:3086: smartavyā ityanena bhūyastarānniṣedha evopodvilitaḥ tathāvidha vīcismṛtau gamanavārtāyā apyayogāt
GK16ruyalscu:3108: atra janmani punaritthām anubhūtamanastvamiha na prākkoṭyapekṣaṃ pūrvamityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3109: vivekasya viśeṣato dhvaṃsādupacitena mohāndhakāreṇa duruttaraḥ ko 'pi
GK16ruyalscu:3115: ka evaṃ jānīte? na kasyacididaṃ saṃbhāvyam ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3120: ataḥ śleṣagarbhatve śleṣo bādhakaḥ udbhaṭamatāvalambinām anyeṣāṃ tu saṅkaraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3138: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇamantareṇa na saṃbhavatīti tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhānāt tadabhāve 'pi yadi kāryasaṃbhavaḥ, tadavāstavatvāt virodhoduṣpariharaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3139: yadi kenaciduktivaicitryeṇa kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryasaṃbhava upanibaddhaḥ tadā vaiśiṣṭyena kāryabhāvanā dvibhāvanā /
GK16ruyalscu:3144: prāmāṇikatvāt balinā kāraṇābhāvena kāryameva bādhyate, na tu kāraṇābhāvaḥ,
GK16ruyalscu:3146: etadvavyatirekarūpayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇasya viśeṣoktyalaṅkārasyāpi virodhato bheda ityāha-evaṃ viśeṣoktavityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3153: kriyāphalameva kāryamiti na hi sarveṣāmabhyupagamaḥ, kintu vaiyākaraṇānāmeva /
GK16ruyalscu:3154: ataḥ kriyā vyatirekiṇo 'pi kāraṇāsya saṃbhavāt sāmānyataḥ
GK16ruyalscu:3158: sā cātiśayoktirvibhāvanāṃ na vyabhicaratīti na bādhyate /
GK16ruyalscu:3174: anye tu saṃbharaṇāpuṣpayormaṇḍanāstre pratyāsavamadanyāyena sākṣādakarāṇatvādvāṅmātraṃ vibhāvanātvavacanam
GK16ruyalscu:3177: apare tu vayasi maṇḍanatvādyāropāt rūpakameva yattva saṃbharaṇādi vaiśiṣṭyaṃ tadatraiva adhiropitamityāhuḥ
GK16ruyalscu:3181: rūpakatve hi vayaso maṇḍanaṃ rūpopagrāhitāyā maṇḍanamevedamityādi prasajet
GK16ruyalscu:3193: tadeva cetyāryaṃ na janayeta(t)tadā kimeṣāṃ samagratvam /
GK16ruyalscu:3194: ataḥ kāraṇāni cet samagrāṇi tadā niyamena kāryotpattiriti sthitam /
GK16ruyalscu:3199: itthaṃ ca sati viśeṣamabhivyaṅgaktum uktiriti viśeṣoktiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3213: tatra hetuḥ anuktaścintitumaśakyaḥ triṣvapi yojayati-atra satyapi dāheti /
GK16ruyalscu:3214: svarūpeṇa śaktimāniti svaśabdena viruddhena dharmeṇa kvacidiyaṃ vibhāvanayā saṅkīryata iti darśayitumāha-kāryānupattirityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3217: yo me prathamaparibhogena kaumāraṃ hṛtavān adyāpi sa eva varaḥ vasantakṣapāḥ api tā eva /
GK16ruyalscu:3220: ahamapi sā caivāsmi, purātanī premadārā na kuṇṭhitetyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3221: athāpi revānadīkūle tatra vetasītarutale suratavyāpāralīlāvidhau cetaḥsamuktaṇṭhate /
GK16ruyalscu:3232: atra ślokaḥ- kāryāṃśasya yadā bhāvābhāvau vaktumapekṣitau /
GK16ruyalscu:3245: rājasuvismereṣu paśyatsu tava khaṅge yugapatkīrtyā nirgamena śriyā praveśena cendrajālaṃ kṛtam
GK16ruyalscu:3264: prāyeṇa bhūpāḥ svato svato hitaparāṅmukhā viṣayākrāntā bhavanti /
GK16ruyalscu:3267: yadvā bāhyo mantrānadhikṛtaḥsevakajano vara mantriṇastu dhik /
GK16ruyalscu:3289: vārāṇāsi!tvayi tu tyaktatanūnāṃ divyatanulābhastāvadāstāṃ mūlaṃ prācīnā tanurapyapunarlābhāya yāti /
GK16ruyalscu:3309: tvamevāñcidhasaundaryā sa ca ruciratāyāḥ paricitaḥ yuvāṃ kalābhijñau ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3348: dyauḥsvargaḥ, dharā pṛthvī, jalādhārāḥsamudrāstadavadhiriti niḥśeṣatvoktiḥ aho kiyat, iyattaiva nāstītyarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3350: yāvatā śūnyamiti nāmno 'pi nāsti gatiḥ kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:3363: na sva rūpāpekṣayā parasparajananasyāsaṃbhavena samyagvirodhitvāt kriyādvārakameveha parasparajananam

GK16ruyalscu:3378: yeṣām iti ṣaṣṭhīnideśe 'pi na gīrbhiḥsaha sambandhamātram, api tu viśiṣṭaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:3385: ekena yadyathā sādhitaṃ tasya tathaivānyathīkaraṇaṃ vyāghātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3388: dṛśā dagdhasya dṛśaiva jīvanāñcārulocanā virūpākṣasya janyinyaḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:3406: itthaṃ ca sati anarthotpattilakṣaṇādviṣāmāt bheda ityāha-na tvatreti /
GK16ruyalscu:3407: na hyatra kāryamakāryaṃ kintu tadviruddhaṃ sukaraṃ kāryam /
GK16ruyalscu:3412: atra bālyaṃ rakṣyatvaṃ cāprasthāne hetutvena sambhāvitaṃ pratyuta saukaryeṇa prasthānaṃ sādhayati
GK16ruyalscu:3421: kāryaṃ kāraṇamālāyāṃ prācaḥ prācaḥ paraṃ param //

GK16ruyalscu:3424: yadi pūrva pūrvasya paraṃ paraṃ viśeṣaṇatayā sthāpyate, saikā ekāvalī yañcāpohyate sānyā
GK16ruyalscu:3426: atra parāṇāṃ varāṅganāstāsāṃ rūpaṃ tasya vilāsaḥ sa kusumāyudhasya viśeṣaṇatayā sthāpyate

GK16ruyalscu:3438: atra kodaṇḍādeḥ pūrvapūrvasya śarādyuttarottarasamāsādanaṃ dīpanena guṇāvahatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:3465: arthāntaranyāse hi arthātprakṛta samarthanam, iha tu śabdata iti vibhāgaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3467: netra rucisamānaruca indīvarasya salile nimajjanam, mukhacchrāyānukāriṇaḥ śaśino meghaiśchrādanaṃ, gamanānukārigatīnāṃ haṃsānāṃ palāyanaṃ ceti vākyārthatrayamekavākyatāpannāyāṃ sādṛśyavinodākṣāntau hetuḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3488: jaladadhūmasya vyomasthaganaṃ khadyotānāṃ sphuliṅgāyamānatā, kakubhāṃ vidyujjvālāpiṅgatā ca
GK16ruyalscu:3505: pratītaḥsamarthyate cet samarthyasamarthakabhāvaḥ tadā padārthasya tvatalādiśiraskatayā hetutvenopādāne na kaścidalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3512: yadā tāṭasthyenopāttasya vākyasya arthaparyālocanayā hetutvaṃ tadārtāntaranyāsaḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:3517: yatpunaḥ kāryakāraṇagatatvenārthāntarasya samarthakatvaṃ tadukta lakṣaṇaṃ kāvyaliṅgamapyanapekṣyaiva
GK16ruyalscu:3521: kāryakāraṇayostu samarthakatvaṃ arthānataranyāse darśitacaramiti gatiriyatī viṣayavibhāgā yāśrayitavyā /
GK16ruyalscu:3546: samudāyasya samudāyena sambandhe śābde paryālocanayā avayavatramasambandha ityārthatā /
GK16ruyalscu:3548: lāvaṇyaprabhā tyāgāvanībharakṣaṇatvaśālini tvayi sati indupūṣacintāratnakulakṣmābhṛtāṃ nairarthakyaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:3553: yathāsaṃkhyaṃ tathā śābdam ārthaṃ ceti dvidhā matam” //
GK16ruyalscu:3555: eka manekasminanekamekasmin vā krameṇa paryāyaḥ // RuAss_60 //
GK16ruyalscu:3561: evaṃ tarhi viśeṣālaṅkāre yaugapadyagrahaṇaṃ kiṃ na kṛtamityata āha-iha
GK16ruyalscu:3563: iha amapratipādanāttatra yaugapadyaṃ lakṣaṇatvena arthāt siddhyati ityarthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3566: vakṣyamāṇe samuccaye yaugapadyaṃ lakṣaṇatvena gṛhīṣyata ityāha-ata eva guṇeti /
GK16ruyalscu:3570: iha yo 'yamanekārthaḥ sa pṛthavṛttiḥ saṅghatātmā ca /
GK16ruyalscu:3574: yataḥ prāk hṛdaye, aya tadapekṣayoparikaṇṭhe vātsīḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3578: atrādhara[kandu]kau karādhārau nivṛttikriyāṃ prati apādānatvena saṃhatau /
GK16ruyalscu:3594: samasya samena saha vinimayaḥ ekā parivṛttiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3599: uro datveti-hiraṇyākṣavadhādyeṣu yuddheṣu uro datvā daityānāṃ yaśo gṛhītam
GK16ruyalscu:3613: anekatra prātpavata ekasyaikatra niyamanaṃ parisaṅkhyā ekakaratra varjanena anyataratra saṅkhyānāt
GK16ruyalscu:3619: praśrapūrvikā śābdī tathaivārthī apraśrapūrvikā śābdī tathaivārthī[ti]caturdhā /
GK16ruyalscu:3639: atra śleṣaḥ pūrvam siddha iti na bādhakaḥ api tu cārutāvaha
GK16ruyalscu:3642: pākṣikatvaniyama anekatra yugapatprātpau parisaṅghyeti hi vākyavitprasiddhaṃ lakṣaṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:3644: itthamataḥ pākṣikaprātpirūpaṃ niyamalakṣaṇamapi svīkriyata iti yugapatsaṃbhāvanātmakaṃ parisaṅkhyālakṣaṇāmiha[prāyikam]
GK16ruyalscu:3657: apare punaḥ “ive pratikṛtā”viti kana upamārthatvena varṇāyanti /
GK16ruyalscu:3669: sthirā apiprahvī bhavanti, loleṣu kā kathā? atra prākaraṇikārthāpātaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3672: śaṅkākaraṃ kimayaṃ sevya uta neti śaṅkājanakam /

GK16ruyalscu:3726: rasa iha śṛṅgāraḥṣad dagvikārāṇāmeṣāṃ tadekaniṣṭhatvāt kathaṃ bhinnakriyaṃ nyañcitamityarthaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:3765: ekasya siddhihetau anyasya tatkaratvaṃ ca // RuAss_66 //
GK16ruyalscu:3766: ekasmin kasyacit siddhihetau spardhayā anyasyāpi tatkaratvaṃ samuccayaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3772: yathā khale kapottāḥ spardhayā pratisvaṃ ahamahamikayāvataranti /
GK16ruyalscu:3773: tathā bhāve samuccayaḥ iti mahān bhedaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3774: khale kapotā asyāṃ santi nītāviti khalekapotikā /
GK16ruyalscu:3779: evaṃ devadattasya āgamanaṃ dasyīnāñcacopanipātastaiśca tasya vadhaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3780: tatra devadattatasyusamāgamaḥ kākatālasamāgama iveti eka upamārthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3790: yairjano darpaṃ vrajati, ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ unmārganivārakāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3796: navavayaḥ prabhṛteḥ kathamaśobhanatvam ityata āha-navavaya ityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:3797: śaśīti-śaśyādi viśeṣyaṃ śobhanaṃ dhūsaratvādi viśeṣaṇavaśādaśobhanamiti viśiṣṭasya dvairūpyam
GK16ruyalscu:3800: anyathā tu na yojanīyamityata āha-na tvatreti /
GK16ruyalscu:3818: durvāretyatratvitthaṃ “śaṭhaḥ kathaṃ soḍhavya” iti sarvathā kaṣṭatvamevopasaṃhṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:3862: ayi ehi tāvatsundari karṇāṃ dattvā śṛṇu vacanīyam /

GK16ruyalscu:3867: kvacit upamānasya sataḥ upamānatvameva nyakkaraṇādalaṅkāraṃ samutthāpayatītyāha-kvacitpunariti

GK16ruyalscu:3888: dṛktāralyā dinā sahajena lakṣaṇena līlā madodayahetukaṃ dṛktāralyādi tirodadhāti /
GK16ruyalscu:3892: atra himamā gantikalakṣaṇābhyāṃ kamparomāñcābhyāṃ bhayakṛtau kamparomāñcau sthagayati /
GK16ruyalscu:3901: apahnutau hi prakṛtaniṣedhenāprakṛtapratiṣṭhāpanam ihatu na tathā /

GK16ruyalscu:3931: dhavalo 'sīti- dhavalo 'si yadyapi sundara! tathāpi tvayā mama rañjitaṃ hṛdayam /

GK16ruyalscu:3947: praśrānupādāne 'pyuttarā dunnayanamekamuttaram upāttasya ca praśrasya yadasambhāvyamasakṛduttaraṃ taddvitīyam /
GK16ruyalscu:3959: kiṃ saukhyaṃ sukalatraṃ kiṃ duḥkhaṃ yat khalo lokaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:3986: sūkṣmaṃ tu sūkṣmaṃ saṃlakṣya vidagdheṣu prakāśanam /
GK16ruyalscu:4000: apalāpamātraṃ cintayeti sasmitasvakathanāt punaḥ prakāśanaṃ lakṣaṇatayāna cintanīyamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4007: iha tu vyājoktyupavarṇanāt so 'pahnuti prakāra eva nāstītyekaivāpahnutaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4012: anyathoktasya vākyasya kākuśleṣābhyāṃ anyathā yojanaṃ vakroktiḥ //
