GK16ruyalscu:4017: guruparatantratayā asau guruparatā samaye 'smin naiṣyati na neṣyatīti
GK16ruyalscu:4028: devastu hālāṃ surāṃ na vibharmi nāpi ca halaṃ sīram /
GK16ruyalscu:4040: devyāha-ko dveṣṭi vināyakam? deva āha-ahiloka iti /
GK16ruyalscu:4043: candragrahaṇena indu paṇena vinā na rame iti devī /
GK16ruyalscu:4054: nanu vicchittirūpatvāt sarva evālaṅkāro vakroktirityata āha-vakroktīti /
GK16ruyalscu:4084: nanu munirjayatītyudāhariṣyamāṇe bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣatā bhrāntiḥ kiṃ neṣyata ityata āha-na ceyamiti /
GK16ruyalscu:4093: atiśayoktau hi anyadanyatayā adhyavasīyate iha tu na tathā /
GK16ruyalscu:4096: bhūtam abhūtatvena bhāvina abhāvitvena nā dhyavasīyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4098: yañcātra pratyakṣatvaṃ tadapyanyathā adhyavasīyate ityāha-na cāpīti /
GK16ruyalscu:4100: nanubhūtabhāvinoḥ apratyakṣayoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatvam anyathādhyavasāya ityata āha-na hi pratyakṣatvamiti
GK16ruyalscu:4105: na hi pratipattāramanapekṣya vastuni pratyakṣatā nāma kācit /
GK16ruyalscu:4110: ataḥ pratyakṣatvaṃ na kevalaṃ vastudharmaḥ pratipattustu sāmagrī tatra upayujyata ityāha-kevralamiti
GK16ruyalscu:4111: asāmagrīke pratipattari na vastu pratyakṣībhavatītyetāvadvaktuṃ śakyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4117: atyadbhutāni hi vastūni ādarapratyayena hṛdi sandhāryamāṇāni tathā bhāvanāṃ prayojayanti /
GK16ruyalscu:4118: itthaṃ ca satilikayātrāyāṃ vartamānārthasākṣātkaraṇasāmagrī cakṣurādiryogināṃ kāvyatattvavidāṃ cātītānāgatārthasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanā /
GK16ruyalscu:4119: ato yogivat kāvyatattvavidāmatītārthasākṣātkāro nānyathādhyavasāya iti nātiśayoktiḥ śaṅkyā
GK16ruyalscu:4120: nanu pratyakṣatayaiva pratīyante bhūtabhāvina iti pratīyamānotprekṣā kiṃ na syādityata āha-nāpi bhūtabhāvināmiti /
GK16ruyalscu:4127: padārthagato hi ivārthaḥ upamāyāḥ prayojako notprekṣātve
GK16ruyalscu:4129: padārthagato hi ivārthaḥ upamāyāḥ prayojako notprekṣāyāḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4132: tasmādabhimānagocara eva ivārthaṃ utprekṣāprayojaka iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4135: nanu pratipattṝdharmo 'dhyavasāyastarhi prayoktuḥ kaveḥ na syādityata
GK16ruyalscu:4149: paripāṭyāpi sacamatkārapratīteḥ puraḥ sphuraṇā sādhāraṇī, athāpi na bhāvikarasavatorabhedaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4150: kutaḥ? ratihāsādicittavṛttīnāṃ tadanurañjitatvena vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇāṃ ca yadā paramādvaitajñānivat mamaiva śatrorevetyādiviśeṣaparihārāt sādhāraṇyena hṛdayasaṃvādinī pratītiḥ tadaiva rasavato bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4151: vibhānādīn rasavatprastutau vivecayiṣyena hṛdayasaṃvādinī pratītiḥ tadaiva rasavato bhāvaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4153: iha tubhūtabhāvināṃ pratītirna sādhāraṇyena apitu pratipattuḥ tāṭsthyena /
GK16ruyalscu:4155: yathā sāṅkhyādisiddhānāṃ bhede na sarvaṃ jānatāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4162: athoktarakālaṃ pratipattṝpratīteḥ tādrūpyāpattyā vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇye rasavān bhāvikahetukaḥsyāt
GK16ruyalscu:4167: svabhāvokterhi laukikānāmeva vastūnāṃ yaḥsūkṣmo dharmaḥ prekṣāvatpratibhaika samadhigamyastasya varṇane hṛdayasaṃvādaḥsādhāraṇyena
GK16ruyalscu:4172: yadi laukikavastupratīteḥspuṭatvaṃ tadā kiṃ syādityata āha-kvacittviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4177: svabhāvoktau rasavati ca yadyapi sādhāraṇyena hṛdayasaṃvādaḥsacetasāṃ,
GK16ruyalscu:4180: satyapi sādhāraṇye vastusvabhāvasya saṃvādaḥ svabhāvoktau rasavati tu cittavṛtteḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4188: nanu vyastasambandharahitasandarbhasamarpitatvamiha lakṣaṇaṃ tathātve ca prasādākhyo guṇa evetyata āha-nāpyayaṃ śabdetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4189: iha yadyapi jhaṭityarthasamarpaṇaṃ śabdānākulatvahetakaḥ athāpi nāyaṃ prasādaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4190: tatra hetuḥ - tasya hi sphuṭā sphuṭetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4196: atra śuṣkendhanāgnivadityasphuṭaṃ vākyārthaṃ prasyupamoktiḥ svacchrajalavaditi sphuṭaṃ prati
GK16ruyalscu:4197: ataḥsarvatra vihita sthititvena jhaṭiti samarpaṇaṃ rūpaṃ prasādasya /
GK16ruyalscu:4198: asya tu prasāde jhaṭiti samarpitasya sphuṭatvena pratītau satyāṃ samanantaraṃ svarūpapratilambhaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4199: svarūpaṃ hi asyaśrotari kavigatabhāvapratibimbanaṃ paunaḥpunyena cetasi viniveśasvabhāvabhāvanātmakaṃ vā /
GK16ruyalscu:4205: sarvottīrṇaḥ bhrāntyādiṣu prasādaguṇāntaraśaṅkiteṣvekatrāpi nāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya ityarthaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4212: tathāvidhena yena ekasminneva culuke pipāsoddhṛtaniravaśeṣārṇavārbhbhasi prasṛtigarte divyau amānuṣānubhāvātiśayau viṣṇordaśāvatāreṣu prasiddhāpadānau matsyakacchrapau yadṛcchrayā culukāntarbhāvāt paryākulaṃ luṭhantau dṛṣṭau /
GK16ruyalscu:4213: atrātītavṛtto 'pi muniḥ alaukikatvenātyadbhutaḥsannādara pratyayena hṛdi sandhāryamāṇatvāt
GK16ruyalscu:4214: tathāvidhaṃ kavibhāvaṃ pratipattṝṣu pratibimbayati paunaḥpunyena cetasi bhāvanāṃ viniveśayatīti bhāvakatvam /
GK16ruyalscu:4216: harṣacaritaprāraṃbhe hi devīṃ sarasvatīṃ abhiśatpavate krodhamunaye kruddhānāṃ vedānāṃ svarūpam upavarṇitam /
GK16ruyalscu:4219: tadigbhiḥ parikarabandhabhramitakṛṣṇājinapaṭacchrāyāśyāmāyamānadivasairamarṣani ḥ śvāsaḍolāpreṅkholitabrahmayokaiḥ somarasamivasvedavisaravyājena stravadbhiḥ agrihotrapavitrabhāsmasmeralalāṭapaṭṭakuśatantucīvarībhirāṣāḍhibhiḥ praharaṇīkṛtadaṇḍakamaṇḍalumaṇḍalaiḥ mūrtaiḥ caturvedairiti” /
GK16ruyalscu:4221: nanu varṇānāvaśāt pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ kiṃ bhāvikaviṣayaḥ āhosvidanubhāvaviśeṣātpratyakṣāyamāṇasya sato varṇanamityata āha-ayaṃ
GK16ruyalscu:4228: anubhāvaviśeṣādeva pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ varṇyate na tu varṇanāvaśātpratyakṣāyamāṇatā /
GK16ruyalscu:4231: na prakārāntaragocara iti yaduktaṃ tatra hetuḥ - kavisamarpitānāmiti /
GK16ruyalscu:4232: ye hi kavinā pratibhayā samarpyante mukhādau candratvakamalatvādayo dharmāsteṣāmevāṅkalāratvam

GK16ruyalscu:4236: cakārādabhūtabhāvitvādayaḥ śabdānākulatā ceti hetavo bhāmahānuśāsane udbhaṭalakṣaṇe ca anākulatvarūpaṃ yadetadvyastasambandharahitaśabdasamarpitatvaṃ pratyakṣāyamāṇātvapratipādakamuktaṃ tat kathaṃ prayojakībhavet /
GK16ruyalscu:4239: atra uttare prakāre nanu vāstave 'pi saundarye laukikatayā mā
GK16ruyalscu:4241: kaveḥ kakavinibandhasya vā vaktuḥ nibandhavaśādastyeva sakalavyavahartṛgocarībhātatā durapahnavāvicchittiḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4242: tatra kuto na bhāvikamityata āha-yadi tu vāstavamapītyādinā /
GK16ruyalscu:4243: yadi vastusanniveśyapi saundaryanibandhavaśāt savicchittikaṃ prāñca ācāryāḥ svabhāvoktivadalaṅkāratayā varṇayeyuḥ tadā ayamapi vāstavasaundaryaviṣayatayā samāśaṅkito bhāvikaprakāro nātīva duḥśliṣṭa eva
GK16ruyalscu:4246: vastusvabhāvasaukṣmyāt sādhāraṇyena sacotanasaṃvādācca vicchittimatī varṇitā tathaiva vāstavasaundaryāvalambitayā nibandhā dvicchitti viśeṣo
GK16ruyalscu:4253: bhūtabhāvinaḥ pratyakṣā iva yatra kriyante ityetāvadeva bhāvikalakṣaṇamakāri yaiḥ khalu tairaśabdānākulatvādiva lakṣaṇatvenoktam /
GK16ruyalscu:4256: ato bhūtabhāvipratyakṣavadbhāvikalakṣaṇasya bhāvikasya śabdānākulatvavāstava saundaryāvalambenāpi bhāvikaprabhedo 'bhyanujñāyate
GK16ruyalscu:4257: yata itthaṃ svabhāvoktipratiyogitayā mīmāṃsā pravartayitavyā, ataḥ samprati saṅgatimāha--svabhāvoktyā kiñciditi /
GK16ruyalscu:4260: satyapi sādṛśyaṃ kiñcinmātraṃ athāpi nyāyasañcārāyehāsmābhiḥ lakṣaṇamasya kṛtam /
GK16ruyalscu:4307: tathā vibhāvānubhāvaiḥ sūcitā vyabhicāriṇaḥ devatāviṣayā ratiśca bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4310: eṣāṃ caturṇāmupanibandhe paripāṭyā rasavān preyaḥ ūrjasvi samāhitamiti alaṅkārā iti sūtrārthaḥ
GK16ruyalscu:4316: ratihāsaśokādīnāṃ vāsanātmanāṃ sthāyibhāvānāṃ yāni loke kāryakāraṇasahakārīṇi tāni kāvye sandṛbdhāni nāṭye cābhinītāni guṇālaṅkāramahimnā caturvidhābhinayamahimnā ca vibhāvanā danubhāvanādviśiṣyābhimukhyacaraṇācca vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇā uccante /
GK16ruyalscu:4317: taiḥ prakāśito vyañcito ratyādiḥ sāmājikacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śṛṅgārādiko rasa iti dik /
GK16ruyalscu:4323: vibhāvānubhāvābhyāṃ vyañjito vyabhicāri vākyārthībhāvadaśāyāṃ bhāva ucyate
GK16ruyalscu:4326: tathā kāntāvyatirikte devatādiviṣaye vyañjito ratyādirapi bhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4335: nanu rase 'pi praśamaḥ kiṃ nocyate ityata āha-tatrāpītyādi /

GK16ruyalscu:4343: nanu nibandhane balaṃ nāma kimityata āha-anaucityeti /
GK16ruyalscu:4347: kasya? prakṛtatvāduktasya bhāvabhedasya yasya praśama ityapi paryāyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4348: nanu rasavadādinā dvitāyodāttasya ca kā kakṣyetyata āha-tatra
GK16ruyalscu:4350: yatra hi bhāmahādidarśane vākyārthībhāvāt pradhānabhūtā eva rasādayo rasavadādyalaṅkārāḥ tatra aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya upapadyate /
GK16ruyalscu:4352: yasmiṃmastu rasavadādiralaṅkāro aṅgabhūtarasādiviṣaya eva aṅginastu rasāderalaṅkāryabhāvāpannasya rasabhāvādidhvanirūpatayā vyātpatvāt tatra dhava nidarśane dvitīyasyāṅgabhūtamahāpuruṣacaritalakṣaṇasyodāttālaṅkārasya viṣayo nāvaśiṣyate /

GK16ruyalscu:4369: dūrīkṛtaḥ”iti vadan vyāsaktakaṇṭhagraho buddhvā riktabāhulayacastāraṃ roditīti /

GK16ruyalscu:4395: vyabhicāribhāvaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāraṃprati guṇātvāt preyo 'laṅkāra iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4399: alaṅkārāntarabhramau mā bhūdeti paryāyamasyāha-eṣa eva ceti /
GK16ruyalscu:4410: ato rasaṃ guṇīkṛtya nibandhanameva balāditi ūrjasvī /
GK16ruyalscu:4436: atrautsukyaṃ bhāvasyodayaḥ tasya ca guṇabhāva iha vivakṣaṇīyaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4438: vāmena kareṇa priyatamāyā nayanāśrudhārāṃ dakṣiṇīna kṛpāṇādhārāṃ pramārjayan kartavyamūḍho 'bhūdityatthaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4444: atra kkākāryaṃ kva ca śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kulamiti vitarkaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4465: ya ete anuprāsādayo bhāvaśabalatāntāḥ pṛthaguktāḥ teṣāṃ saṃbhavānusāreṇa yadi kutracit viṣaye sahabhāvaḥ tadaite kiṃ pṛthakpṛthagevālaṅkārāḥ utta sahabhāvavaicitryamalaṅkārāntarameveti cintāyāṃ siddhāntayitumāha-tatra
GK16ruyalscu:4467: sauvarṇa maṇimayānāṃ pṛthak cārutvahetutve 'pi saṃśleṣato yathā cārutvāntaraṃ tathānuprāsādīnāṃ apyalaṅkārāntarameva /
GK16ruyalscu:4471: yatobheda utkaṭo 'nutkaṭaśca ato dṛṣṭāntau samañjasāvityāha-ata evetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4474: saṅkaraḥ saprabhedaṃ jijñāsito 'pi saṃsṛṣṭyanantaraṃ vakṣyata ityāha-saṅkarastviti /
GK16ruyalscu:4477: atra pūrvārdhe bhakārāpekṣayā uttarārdhe ca lakārāpekṣayā vṛttyanuprāsaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4479: tathā lakalolakalo iti kalolakalola iti ca sajātīyayamakayorapi /
GK16ruyalscu:4491: pāda evāmbujamiti rūpakapakṣesa pratikūlaḥ ambakūlaḥ ambuje tadayogāt /
GK16ruyalscu:4508: evaṃ ca sati aṅgulībhiriveti yā vākyenoktā yā ca sarojalocanam iti samāsena tābhyāmupamābhyāṃ śleṣeṇa cānugṛhītā mukham iti
GK16ruyalscu:4510: teṣāṃ balena samutthānādutthitā cotthāpakānāṃ camatkānāṃ camatkārakatvahetuḥ ityaṅgāṅgitā
GK16ruyalscu:4515: atra vāruṇīti śleṣaḥ trayīmayo 'pyagamaditi virodhapratibhotthāpakaḥ tadvādhakaśca /
GK16ruyalscu:4521: tatra virodhaśleṣā vanupraviṣṭau yacca kāraṇotprekṣānimittaṃ pātādikāryaṃ tatra vāstavau pātāgripraveśāvupahatihetukapātāgripraveśābhyāmabhedena adhyavasitau /
GK16ruyalscu:4525: yadyapi śleṣo viridhapratibhotpattihetuḥ yadyapi cātiśayoktiḥ utprekṣānimittaṃ tathāpi nānayoḥ śleṣābhyāṃ sahāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4531: śleṣasya tu viviktau'styevetyata āha-na ca mantavyamityādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4533: ataḥ śleṣeṇa anyabādha iti tamnadhyānupraviṣṭo virodho 'pi bādhya eva /
GK16ruyalscu:4552: yathā hi śabdayormitho nopakāraḥ tathā śabdālaṅkārayorapi /

GK16ruyalscu:4557: ataḥ śabdālaṅkāraparihāreṇa aṅgāṅgibhāva iti nirṇāyati-evameṣa iti /

GK16ruyalscu:4577: binduḥ śuddhādhvopādānamahāmāyā nādo 'nāhataḥ tau prasaratoyasmāt sisṛkṣostasmai /
GK16ruyalscu:4583: anantaḥ śeṣo mathanādau śeṣībhūtaḥ , tena prakāśaḥ prathitaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4584: iha śaṅkara eva kṣīrasindhuriti rūpake sādhakam /
GK16ruyalscu:4586: amṛtaśabdo hi sudhāyāṃ pracuraprasiddhikaḥ kṣīrasindhāvanukūlatarara iti rūpakasamāsa evāyam
GK16ruyalscu:4594: avantīścararūpāt pārijātāt jātāni yaśorūpāṇi prasūnāni digrūpāṇāṃ
GK16ruyalscu:4603: nanu śaradīveti samabhivyāhṛteyam upamā kathaṃ nopamāsādhiketyata āha-
GK16ruyalscu:4605: nyāyato vākyārthībhūtaṃ rūpakamābhāsata ekadeśavirtinyupamā na hi bādhiturm iṣṭe /
GK16ruyalscu:4613: prakāntenaikenaiva nirvahaṇīyamiti naiṣā rājājñā yena dṛṣṭabādha āśaṅkyate
GK16ruyalscu:4618: iha tu uttarottaraṃ prakarṣavivakṣeti upamāpekṣayā rūpake sāmyaprakarṣaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4623: hāraḥ kuṭhārāyata iti tūpamayā prakarṣa nītaḥ /
GK16ruyalscu:4625: sāmānyaprayoge upamābādhaka iti nyāyopanno rūpakaprakrama eva nirvahīṇīya iti yāvat /
GK16ruyalscu:4629: itthamaṅgāṅgibhāvasandeha rūpaṃ prakāradvayaṃ vivicya tṛtīyaṃ prakāraṃ
GK16ruyalscu:4638: ekatraiva narakaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau śliṣṭaśabdenobhayopakārāt śabdaśleṣeṇāpyupamā saṅkarārthamāha-atra ca yathetyādi /
GK16ruyalscu:4646: ataḥ sāmagrīyogāt sampannā dyotitaraṅgaśobhinītyekasminneva śabde sabhaṅgapadatvāt śabdaśleṣeṇa saṃkīrṇam /
GK16ruyalscu:4653: udbhāṭaprakāśitastu prakārāntaragocaraśabdārthālaṅkārasaṃkaraḥ saṃsṛṣṭau antarbhāvita iti tasya saṃkaratvamaṅgāṅgibhāva
GK16ruyalscu:4674: stutyā nindāyāḥ nindāyā vā stutergamyatve vyājastutiḥ /

GK16ruyalscu:4706: itthaṃ bhūmrā rucakavacasāṃ vistaraḥ karkaśo 'yaṃ ṭīkāsmābhiḥ samuparacitānena sañjīvanīyam
